name: 1968 C & L Cantiere Craglietto1968 C & L Cantiere Craglietto
description:
ailing yacht TELSTAR VI is a classically designed, auxiliary ketch with the character and style of the 1960’s with the luxurious comfort, amenities and advantages of a modern yacht. Her strength and long range will provide endless enjoyment for local and world cruising.
TELSTAR VI is a 29m ketch designed in 1967 by renowned naval architect Alan Buchanan and built in Italy by Cantiere Craglietto Yard no. 62. Her keel was laid in 1967 and she was completed in 1968. 
“TELSTAR VI is the chronology of the ownership, custody or location of a historical object. The term was originally mostly used in relation to works of art, used in similar senses in a wide range of fields, including archaeology and manuscripts”
TELSTAR VI is carvel built of mahogany and oak. She underwent a substantial refit in Malta from 2012 to 2019 where she was completely stripped out, partly replanked, beams and floor replaced with laminated beams, re fastened and sheathed with epoxy. The extensive refit enables MCA coding.
 Mehr anzeigen

name: 1992 Jongert 25S1992 Jongert 25S
offerer: HAAS INTERNATIONAL - The Sailing Yacht Broker
description:
The Jongert 25s COLOMBAIO is a perfect example of a semi-custom-built ketch by the famous Jongert Shipyard with an interior design by Peter Sijm.  
The classic 25 series is one of the most successful designs of the Dutch shipyard. With her superior build quality and high safety margins used throughout the design, COLOMBAIO is able to travel the world through all seas and weather in highest comfort. 
Sisterships of COLOMBAIO have sailed more than 300’000 NM and still continue to delight owner, guests and crew. Her sail plan and effortless handling systems makes her easy to sail for a small crew.
Distinctive handcrafted elements are to be found throughout the entire yacht, from the beautiful wooden figurehead at the front, all the way to the characteristic fitted windows at the rear.
The deck plan offers plenty of space for sunbathing.  The well-protected sitting area behind the wheelhouse is perfect for al-fresco dining. The aft platform hosts conveniently the dinghy during navigation and offers easy access to the water with a solid manual lowerable boarding ladder.
Under deck, the voluminous hull offers ample space for a full beam owner’s cabin aft and two equal guests cabins adjacent, each with en-suite bathrooms. 
Amidship, COLOMBAIO features a full beam lower saloon with large windows and portholes and a well-liked bar.
Separated in the forward section is the crew area with large, functional galley and opposite a crew dinette. Forward are two crew cabins, each also with en-suite bathrooms. 
The engine room is very spacious and designed for easy access and proper maintenance. The engine room is very spacious and designed for easy access and proper maintenance. Under engine she has a maximum cruising range of 2000 Nm @ 9 kn. 
KEY FEATURES:

Classic world-cruising ketch with good sailing performance for fast ocean passages 
Always privately used
Excellent finish, built to the highest standards, with many tried-and-tested features that have proven their reliability over decades
Perfectly crafted joinery and general impression of high-quality 
Large volume and great layout that enhances privacy on board, ideal for long stays on board.

Last works on COLOMBAIO:
2019:                         
- New Genoa
- New 12Kw generator Fischer Panda
Summer 2021:      
- New antifouling
- New hull and superstructure paint
- All service batteries renewed
- Deckhouse varnished (8 coats Epifanes PP, 2 coats Epifanes extra UV)
- 1 new LOFRANS anchor winch, 3500W – 24V
 
COLOMBAIO is in need of a new teak deck, a complete service on all her systems, equipment and rigging, as well as new sails, hence her attractive price. 
She’s a perfect choice for a family looking for a very comfortable and safe bluewater cruiser with a first-class pedigree and lasting value. Mehr anzeigen

name: 2001 CNB 93 SAVARONA2001 CNB 93 SAVARONA
description:
SAVARONA, a performance world cruiser, was designed by naval architect Philippe Cabon and Frank Darnet (interior) and custom built in aluminum, by the French yard Construction Navale Bordeaux.      
SAVARONA has been on a proper refit schedule since new.   Her first in 2006, the second in 2010, and the major refit completed in 2015 when hauled at the Gino Yard in Marmaris, Turkey. Shortly before, in August 2014, she had been hauled in Palm Beach f28 or a hull survey and inspection by Patton Marine, one of the best marine survey companies in the world.  
SAVARONA has now completed an extensive refit, done by an experienced owner who is unable to do something “good enough”, it has to be done the right way. His project manager, also a marine surveyor himself, was on site for the entire project. The result is an absolutely stunning yacht that is better than new, with $1.5M invested.   Not only was SAVARONA fully repainted, mast-boom-hull-superstructure, but also new 16 mm Burma teak decks and caprail was laid, with new teak added to the coachroof well. Deck hardware is all new black anodized Lewmar, interior varnishing and refurbishing with high quality fabrics, but the real story is under the floorboards and behind the cabinetry. Virtually every system has been serviced/replaced or modified, so that her planned charter activity would not have any interruptions. Her new owner has the choice of using her as a private yacht or continue with the charter operation, complete with web site.   
Her twin cockpit layout is perfect for guests and crew. The center cockpit area has a rounded settee with a good size table for dining, which was just custom designed and built with an ice bucket and wired Bluetooth linked to the yacht’s stereo system. The aft steering/crew cockpit, also has comfortable rounded seating area, with steering and navigation completely separate. And as the owner needs to run his business while cruising, she has full Internet connectivity and communication from anywhere in the world.
SAVARONA had a beautiful Atlantic crossing in 2017.  She sailed 4,009 miles with an average speed of 9.2 knots (her owner now has over 8,000 miles on board her).
SAVARONA has just undergone her 3rd major refit in 2021 in preparation for a long-term program and her trade registration (RIF). The standing rigging, the engine, and the boom have been changed as well as many systems completely overhauled. Improvements have been made to increase comfort and reliability.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1985 Custom DUBOIS 921985 Custom DUBOIS 92
description: DUBOIS 92, au cours de sa vie, il a entièrement contourné le globe en passant notamment par l'Antarctique. Il a bénéficié d'une refonte sérieuse en 2005 avant sa croisière mondiale. Il a toujours été maintenu dans un état clé en main et vient de terminer une métamorphose nautique sérieuse, y compris la nouvelle peinture sur la coque et la superstructure, sur les mâts et les bômes et la mise à jour complète de ses systèmes. La totalité de son électronique ainsi qu'une majorité de son électroménager ont été remplacés en avril 2019. Au cours des dernières saisons, il a navigué en Méditerranée et a été entretenu par l'équipage à bord pendant la période hivernale. Cela a donné l'occasion à de nombreuses améliorations et changements. Yacht de croisière au pedigree exceptionnel, fut dessiné avec un design personnalisé par Ed Dubois et construit à Double Et Jesse en Allemagne. Son propriétaire actuel est resté fidèle à la qualité et l'esprit du yacht. Fiabilité totale et sécurité ont toujours été les mots clès durant des aventures incroyables non seulement de l'Antarctique à Ushuaia et aux Falklands, mais aussi au Chili, à la côte est des États-Unis, aux les Caraïbes et toutes les parties de la Méditerranée, ainsi qu'en Australie, en Nouvelle-Zélande, en la Polynésie et dans l'océan Indien. Il est maintenant prêt pour de nouvelles aventures avec son futur propriétaire. DOSSIER SUR DEMANDE, aMehr anzeigen

name: 2007 Logger 25 Meter Tweemaster2007 Logger 25 Meter Tweemaster
location: Deko Marina, Parkhaven 3, 8242 PE, Lelystad., Niederlande
description:
Jachtmakelaar Floris Vos 088-2502500Yachtbroker Floris Vos 0031 88 2502500


Een uniek, fantastisch zeilend zeeschip gebouwd voor bewoning en wereldomzeiling. Deze Zeillogger is een nieuw in 2007 gebouwde replica van een 19e eeuwse zeilende haringlogger. Het schip is geschikt voor lange (wereld)reizen, bewoning en geschikt als charter (dagtochten voor groepen en vakantiereizen). Het is een modern gebouwde tweemaster, een zeer snelle zeiler ( 10 knopen is geen probleem) en van alle gemakken voorzien. Door de doordachte kiel-midzwaard constructie heeft het schip een groot vaargebied. De opdrachtgever en huidige eigenaar had als eis aan de ontwerper om een modern, veilig, onderhoudsvriendelijk en een eenvoudig door 2 man te bedienen, comfortabel schip te bouwen, waar hij ook op kon wonen. Dat is gelukt. De boegschroef, het anker en de zeilen worden hydraulisch bediend. De super generator zorgt voor alle benodigde energie. Aan de veiligheid is extra aandacht besteed. De zeerailing is extra hoog, er zijn 3 waterdichte schotten in het schip en er is geen gas aan boord. Het schip is doordacht en onderhoudsvriendelijk gebouwd met 1e klas materialen. Er is geen teakhout gebruikt, het schip is gebouwd van cortenstaal en voorzien van 2 componenten lak. Het is zeer comfortabel aan boord. Er is volop zitruimte op het voordek, de punt, de boeg en achter bij het stuurwiel en op de spiegel. De roef is licht en ruim. Er is een zeer uitgebreide kombuis, een navigatiehoek en een zithoek voor 12 personen. Het uitzicht rondom is geweldig. Benedendeks bevindt zich de ruime salon met bureau, bar en zithoek. In het achterschip is de machinekamer geplaatst en is er een ruimte voor (was)machines. Midscheeps is een gangpad met aan weerszijden hutten en douche en toilet. In de boeg van het schip is een zeer ruime eigenaarshut met eigen douche en toilet. Het schip is weinig gebruikt, van 1e eigenaar en uitstekend onderhouden. Een absoluut uniek schip. een varend comfortabel appartement.  Algemeen: Zeillogger, naam de Hoop, afmetingen: 25 x 6 x 2-4 m, bouwjaar 2006-2007, bouwnummer 21.006, bouwer Helldörfer Scheepsbouw Arnhem, ontwerper Peter Bosgraaf Yacht and Boat Design, S-spant, hefkiel, cortenstaal, waterverplaatsing 64 ton, ballastlood (gegoten), 6 slaapplaatsen in 3 hutten, 2 extra in de salon en 1 extra in aparte ruimte, stahoogte 2,20 m, bedlengtes 2,10 m, ramen dubbel glas in aluminium, stangenbesturing, 2 keer natte cel, rvs zeereling, ankerlier (hydraulisch), stokanker 145 kg, 50 meter ankerketting 16mm.  Tuigage: Schoener getuigd, doorvaarthoogte 23,5 m, verstaging Duform 12, 14 en 19 mm, grootzeilen 76 m2 en 77,9 m2, fok 36 m2, kluiver 67 m2, reeflijnen, 10 lieren (Anderson), 4 hydraulische lieren (2SP 50ST).  Motor: 2 x Perkins Sabre RE30850, 2 x 87 PK, bouwnummers 290112N en 290116N, bouwjaar 2006, slechts 500 motoruren, verbruik diesel 8 liter/uur, hydraulische overbrenging, stalen dieseltanks 3.000 liter, toerenteller, urenteller, oliedrukmeter, temperatuurmeter, klapschroef (brons), hydraulische boegschroef (10 uren).  Navigatie en apparatuur: 5 x 12V accu, 12 x 2V accu's, walstroom, omvormer (Victron), generator (Kohler 9 KVA), volt/ampèremeter, kompas , dieptemeter, fishfinder, windset (Maretron, multifunctioneel), GPS (Maretron), marifoon (Vertex VM 3500 E), radar (Nobeltel), AIS binnenvaart.  Elektrisch en water: Stalen watertanks 4.500 liter, boilers (180 liter), 2 douches, 2 toiletten, vuilwatertank 4.500 liter, koelkast, vrieskast, vierpits inductie kooktoestel, oven magnetron(elektrisch), verwarming (hete lucht elektrisch). name: 2024 Sunreef 802024 Sunreef 80
description:
The Sunreef 80 is an all-around sailing leisure yacht ideal for exclusive getaways, charter and transoceanic adventures. This model boasts a combination of exterior and interior areas easily flowing into one another. A clever bridge deck and superstructure design allow for a superior level of comfort onboard whereas the generous teak use, high bulwarks and classy lines underscore her modern style with a classic edge. 
 With a completely fresh superstructure concept, the Sunreef 80 gains a saloon plan with an outstanding potential for customization. A vast, central lounging space with a panoramic view and endless layout possibilities, it opens both onto the bow terrace and cockpit.    The bow benefits from a cozy lounge, well shielded from sun and wind. To the aft, the saloon merges with the generous cockpit extended with a large aft platform. All the areas combined form a universal, open environment where flexibility and freedom reign.   While housing the main helm, the 54m² flybridge is definitely dedicated to leisure with more than enough space for movable furniture, a Jacuzzi, fully-equipped wet bar, a barbecue and large sunpads.    The hulls provide impressive volumes to set up a custom layout including airy, luxurious guest cabins and an opulent master suite with a walk-in dressing, desk, sofa, retractable TV and an immense bathroom. A perfect setting to unwind and relax after a long day in the sun.
Please do get in touch with S6 Marine for more information on this yacht. 
 
The text and images used in this listing are not to be reproduced or shared without direct consent from S6 Marine ©

name: 2024 Sunreef Eco2024 Sunreef Eco
description:
The Green Side of Luxury Yachting...
The Sunreef Eco range is comprised of luxury catamarans that are low maintenance and provide ultra-silent, fume and wake-free cruising, with minimum impact on the environment while still offering the best of autonomy, comfort and performance one would expect from a Sunreef catamaran. Electric yachts are also saving owners money by significantly reducing costs for diesel and maintenance expenses. 
Fossil-fuel free boats rely on energy from the natural elements, such as sun and wind, which is why this range uses a combination of solar panels and wind generators alongside the electric batteries that store the harvested energy.
As with all Sunreef yachts, the Eco range is fully customisable allowing the owner to choose everything from the layout plan, to the interior design. 
So what makes the range ‘Eco-friendly’? 
 
Solar Panels:
A significant feature is the integrated solar skin made up of light weight and flexible solar panels on the hull and superstructure, located perfectly to ensure the new elements do not impose on the elegant design of the classic Sunreef yachts. Made of photovoltaic cells, solar panels convert sunlight into electrical power, so the more panels fitted on the yacht, means more power can be generated. Customisation is still a possibility with the Eco range, and solar panels are designed and made by the shipyard so can be combined with any yacht’s surface and fit any customisation requests as they are easy to adapt. 
 
Hydro-Generation Technology: 
Sunreef’s Eco-friendly yachts use hydro generation technology, designed to generate power whilst sailing. With this, power can be generated from the propeller rotation while the yacht is underway. This energy can be used to power the propulsion battery bank or the electronics onboard. It is a reliable and sustainable source of power.
 
ELECTRIC ENGINES:
Enter a world of vibration and fume-free navigation. Sunreef’s eco-friendly catamarans feature advanced electric engines offering the best of autonomy and performance for a responsible yachting experience.
Thanks to innovative propulsion solutions, the shipyard’s eco-friendly catamarans combine fuel savings, low-maintenance and ultra-silent operation. Electric propulsion is not only the green choice for conscious yachting but also brings more freedom, peace of mind and luxury on board.
 
HYBRID ENGINES:
Sunreef Yachts eco-friendly catamarans have the option to be equipped with ultramodern hybrid propulsion systems as well. Besides significantly reduced Co2 emissions, hybrid engines take eco cruising to the next level by combining the best of electric motoring with the advantages of thermal engines.
Hybrid engines not only offer reliable propulsion but can also be used to recharge the yacht’s battery bank for even more energy-efficiency. Eco-friendly yachts by Sunreef Yachts are a guarantee of solid performance, low-maintenance and Atlantic-range.
 
SAIL: 
Relying on wind as an essential source of propulsion is the most natural way to think about yachting. Sunreef Yachts’ sailing range of eco-friendly catamarans offers top quality rigging and fully-recyclable performance sails. Wind can also be a precious support when it comes to motor yacht propulsion.
The shipyard’s range of Power eco-friendly yachts can be fitted with high-performance kites to combine the advantages of eco motoring with wind propulsion. Frequently used for towing large container ships, kites are an extremely powerful support for leisure crafts.Sunreef Yachts’ motor yachts equipped with kites enjoy oceanic range, massive fuel savings, more visibility and safety.
 
Wind Turbines: 
The Eco range also comes with the possibility of added wind turbines. The turbines are designed to produce power from the wind to keep the yacht’s battery bank charged. They are great for generating power throughout the day, but also in the night and in cloudy weather, when the yacht cannot rely on solar energy, and can operate in a range of wind conditions from very light breeze to storms. 
 
Sustainable Materials:
The Eco-range is dedicated to using sustainably and ethically sourced materials for both the exterior and interior design which is becoming an important issue for the shipbuilding industry. Sunreef Eco yachts are using ethically-sourced teak or cork-based materials for the decking as a green alternative to traditional teak decking. 
In order to reduce energy consumption on board, this range features carefully-calculated insulated interiors thanks to sustainable insulation materials. This means the yacht’s interiors maintain stable temperatures and retain both heat. The air-conditioning system is powered by batteries allowing for silent operation. 
 
The Eco range is available in 50ft, 60ft, 70ft, 80ft and 100ft- enquire for more details on specific models and sizes. The Eco is also available as a power catamaran. 
 
Please do get in touch with S6 Marine for more information on this yacht.

name: 2003 Marine VPLP 772003 Marine VPLP 77
description:
A fast and light classic catamaran, built of Epoxy glass fibre and carbon structure. A safe boat capable of 300-350 miles passage per day.She is designed to give a real sailing experience while ensuring maximum comfort on board. The transverse structure and mast are of carbon fiber in order to keep her strong but light. She is easy to handle with electrical winches, twin helms and a clear view over the coach roof from the cockpit.Dining indoors and outdoors for 12.
TAJ: the legend still goes on… This amazing catamaran originally known as CORIOLAN VI, was highly seen during St Tropez regattas and other famous events: elegance, comfort & performance are guaranteed! Her new current owner has invested not less than EUR 750,000 in a major 8 months refit in 2018: 2 new engines, 2 new generators, new standing rigging, all new interior with spacious, luminous and modern accommodations, etc.TAJ has 4 guests cabins for up to 8 guests and 1 crew cabin for 2 crew members. No fly bridge for such a good-looking catamaran, but the passionate sailors will enjoy 2 aft steering positions, a nice protected cockpit, slim hulls and 2 large trampolines forward. A real ocean-going sailing catamaran for going around the world and also available for charter.Mehr anzeigen

description:
1994 IBRAHIM AKBAS BODRUM CAIQUE TURQUE, 
XBOAT ref 2815.Bateau fini de construire en 1997 au chantier AKBAS réputé pour sa qualité, l'armateur a participé a plusieurs ''Bodrum Cup'' en a gagné 3 puis apres un revers de situation, le bateau a été saisi et vendu en 2008, a 3 frères Menuisiers de bateau qui l'ont reconditionnés en aménagement privé, (4 Cabines) afin de le vendre en fin de chantier en 2009 à un nouveau propriétaire.Décidé de le transformer encore plus, celui ci fait transporter le bateau de Marmaris a Dunkerque par cargo, pour rentrer dans une longue période d'amélioration.Un refit total des circuits électrique, ''E?FFAGE'' un nouveau moteur ''PERK?NS 300cv'' (54 heures) nouveau générateur ''ONAN 27 Kwa'' (152 Heures) Une centrale hydraulique commandant 3 enrouleurs de génois, les 2 voiles sur mats ''SELDEN'', les guindeaux, le propulseur d'étrave, les 2 bossoirs et les barres avec pilote automatique sur joy-stick. Une antenne TV satelitte, un phare projecteur orientable, un éssuie galce rotatif chauffant..etc..etc.. Ceci pour un montant total de 942,000€. Cela a consolidé sa classification CE.En 2018, sans jamais vraiment avoir navigué, il est revendu au propriétaire actuel pour finir les travaux de menuiserie.De Décembre 2019 a Mai 2020 il subit un refit total pour un montant de plus de 130.000€ afin de lui redonner une nouvelle destiné.

Descriptif complémentaire:

2 Mats aluminium "SELDEN" 19 et 17 metres neufs avec enrouleurs de voiles hydraulique.3 enrouleurs de Génois "HARKEN" hydraulique , Toutes voiles neuves.2 guindeaux "LEWMAR" hydraulique neufs avec chaines de 120 metres et 2 ancres "FOG" neuves.Propulseur d'étrave hydraulique.Barres Hydraulique et auto-pilote avec Joystick .Hélice a pas variable "MAX-PROP" avec coupe orin.Déssalinisateur 120litres/heure neuf.Moteur "PERK?NS" 300 CV neuf .Générateur "ONAN" 27 KVA neuf .Electronique de dernière génération "FURUNO" , compas, sondeur, A?S, sonar BB 150Khz, Pilote automatique, Navtex, Navionic Carte R-34 Med, Mini Gyro, essuis glace rotatif et chauffant, Sécurité pour 12 personnes, Survie a Jour pour 12 pax, Téléphone satellite.Lave linge, Lave vaisselle, hotte aspirante - Frigo et Congélateur - Friteuse et Four.4 belles cabines avec douche et wc, possibilité de créer une cabine marin.Water tank : 1000 litres // Fuel tank : 4500 litres // Black tank : 500 litresPavillon Français Certificat CE TVA payée

name: 1991 Scorpio 721991 Scorpio 72
description: This beautiful Bermudian ketch rigged sailing yacht designed by leading American nacal architect Robert H. Perry is an impressive and great example of Scorpio 72. She has four spacious en-suite cabins, two master cabins with queen beds aft and two twin cabins forward all equipped with modern comforts and facilities, each cabin has its own private shower, toilet and independent A/C unit. The vessel underwent a total refit during the last three winters; she is presently equipped with a 19KW Onan generator complying with the new anti-pollution norms. All A/C units have been replaced and are now independent for each cabin. The engine room was totally rebuilt and completely isolated. A new Perkins / Cat MC 300 HP engine was installed in 2020. The strong rigging and the large sail area will ensure the ultimate sailing experience. She was constructed under Bureau Veritas rules for classification at the highest class *Malta cross*1 3/3 E.PRVT - world cruiser she complies with the IMO  and SOLAS rules, she is certified merchant navy ship for passengers transport (under French regulations). Mehr anzeigen

name: 2010 CNB 772010 CNB 77
offerer: HAAS INTERNATIONAL - The Sailing Yacht Broker
description:
The CNB 77 AMAZON CREEK is a beautifully designed semi-custom CNB 77 finished to the highest possible specification for a knowledgeable owner. Solidly built in aluminium alloy by CNB Bordeaux with a carbon mast and spectra running gear, her naval architecture is by the multi award-winning naval architect Philippe Briand, and interior design by Fabrice Lefevre. 
Designed primarily as an owner's yacht for personal use, this fast blue ocean cruiser with go-anywhere capacities sleeps up to four guests in two spacious and supremely comfortable master/VIP cabins, each with roomy en-suite facilities rarely found on similar sized yachts.
Perfect for the Buyer who prizes performance but who is also looking for comfort when traveling over longer distances, she effectively has infinite range and offers the possibility of circumnavigation to the farthest corners of the globe if desired. With just very light use, AMAZON CREEK benefits from low hours on her equipment, and having been immaculately maintained by a professional crew, she looks just as good as new.
Key selling points: 

Pedigree design
Very spacious cabins for her LOA
Fast and lively under sail
High build quality aluminium/carbon construction, very weatherly and safe
Superbly maintained in better than new condition
Replacement cost of over €4m fully equipped

name: 1981 Bermuda Schooner 23 Meter1981 Bermuda Schooner 23 Meter
description:
Schoener, bewezen geschikt als expeditie-, charter schip en voor bewoning


De fraaie schoener "Abel Tasman" is afgeleid van de beroemde "Amerika 1", ontworpen door George Steer. Hoewel "Abel Tasman" geen replica is, heeft ze dezelfde lijnen en opvallende gratie die haar doet opvallen in elke haven. Zij voer talloze zeemijlen over de hele wereld met haar 3 eigenaren. Voor haar tweede eigenaren werd ze hun thuis en een middel om een comfortabel leven te verdienen tijdens het charteren in grotendeels afgelegen gebieden in het verre Noordpoolgebied en de Antarctische wateren. De huidige eigenaar voer verder op dezelfde manier, maar inclusief het beschikbaar maken voor voornamelijk gebruik van documentaire films. In de afgelopen 3 jaar heeft ze meer dan 46.000 mijl gevaren van Europa naar Antarctica, over de Stille Oceaan naar Australië, noorden naar Japan via Nieuw-Guinea, naar de Koerilen-eilanden, naar Kamchatka, de Aluetean-eilanden, Alaska, Northwest Passage, Groenland, Noorwegen en Svalbard. Bijna al deze mijlen waren in charter bij filmbedrijven en privégasten die een comfortabel en bestendig inkomen gaven voor de eigenaar.
Ze heeft een zeer wenselijk en uniek klassiek scheeps gevoel in plaats van een normaal jacht. Haar oversized tuigage en dekuitrusting geven een gevoel van kracht en veiligheid op zee, consistent met haar rompvorm. De romp is opgebouwd uit 10 mm staal waardoor deze geschikt is voor extreme omstandigheden. Haar DAF-motor en 2000 ltr. brandstoftanks bieden voldoende vermogen en ongeveer 900 zeemijlen brandstofbereik. Ze kan 3 maanden lang voldoende voedsel en normale levensbehoeften voor 9 personen dragen. De salon heeft een grote U-vormige bank en twee comfortabele fauteuils. De kombuis heeft een groot fornuis met oven dat ook als verwarming dient. In de salon is een extra dieselverwarming en een cv-installatie verwarmt de rest van de boot. Naast de begeleidende naar stuurboord is een hoofd met kledingkast voor zeiluitrusting. Er zijn 3 tweepersoonshutten in de boeg en een dubbele mastercabine aan bakboord achterin. Verder is in de boeg een natte cel met douche en toilet. In de boeg is een werkruimte en opslagruimte. In de achtersteven is de machinekamer, waar we ook de technische installatie vinden, inclusief generator, watermaker en een ruime hoeveelheid reserveonderdelen om de boot zo zelfvoorzienend mogelijk te maken. Het interieur is gezellig, praktisch van ontwerp en geschikt voor lang verblijf aan boord voor een groep van maximaal 9 personen. De aarzelende beslissing om Abel Tasman te verkopen is te wijten aan een verandering in de situatie door de eigenaar, maar ze is klaar om overal ter wereld te gaan als een thuis of als een bedrijf of misschien als een levensstijl waar ze af en toe een handvest kan dragen om te helpen bij het verdedigen de kosten van het bezitten van een echt zeegaand schip.
Vanuit het oogpunt van de schipper: "De" Abel Tasman "is een krachtige boot om te varen maar is gemakkelijk te behandelen door 2 ervaren zeilers. Haar schoener tuig, in tegenstelling tot een sloep tuig, betekent kleinere zeilen om te hanteren en minder belastingen op lieren en dek versnelling, waardoor slijtage wordt verminderd. Als schipper beseft het me vaak hoe geschikt ze zou zijn als opleidingsschip. Onder begeleiding van ervaren handen is zij het perfecte platform om ervaring op te doen met zeilverwerking, het inzicht in de belastingen en krachten die ermee gemoeid zijn, en wat soms kleine aanpassingen in kracht en snelheid maken. Haar comfort op zee is vaak een bron van verwondering voor mensen, zelfs met vele jaren oceaanzeilen achter zich. Haar verplaatsing, haar zeiloppervlak en ballastverhouding combineren allemaal om een rit & gevoel van veiligheid te geven dat uniek is voor deze boot. Ik kan alleen maar zeggen dat de laatste 46.000 nm, vaak in de wildste denkbare omstandigheden, een plezier was ".
Deze boot wordt bemiddeld via kantoor White Whale Yachtbrokers Enkhuizen. Heeft u belangstelling neem dan contact op via enkhuizen@wwy.nl of +31(0)228 855 380 voor meer informatie of het maken van een afspraak voor bezichtiging aan boord. Bezichtigingen zijn mogelijk van maandag t/m zaterdag.

name: 1986 Irwin 681986 Irwin 68
description:
Shiraz is a truly impressive gentleman's sailing yacht; a rare opportunity to acquire this timeless classic. The current owner has crossed oceans and lived on board in comfort and style, while maintaining and updating her. The seller says “All new upholstery in 2007. Fully equipped with bed linen towels and plates glasses cutlery for twelve people. Lots of spares and quite a few tools. There are of course some things that need to be fixed as in all old boats. Hence the reduction in price to leave room for updates and repairs in budget. The boat was hauled in 2021 and new primer and bottom paint applied. Liferaft recertification 2021. After re-build and closing of the centerboard pocket she is now launched and ready to go.( January 2022). Full rig inspections and necessary repairs and updates done (2021). Sails overhauled and cleaned as where needed (2021). Two new battery chargers - Victron installed 2018. New cockpit cushions and fully enclosed bimini and sail covers 2015. New Windows in bimini 2019. New generator 2016. New refrigeration and 75 litre water heater 2015 (both Isotherm). Water circulation heating system built 2009. Runs throughout the entire boat. (good in Swedish wintertime!). She now needs a new owner to enjoy and care for her.

name: 1989 Alan Pape Williams Boatyard 73 Ft Ketch1989 Alan Pape Williams Boatyard 73 Ft Ketch
description:
Classic Alan Pape Williams Boatyard 73 Ft ketch moored in Valencia, Spain


Classic design by Alan Pape, built 1977-90 - refitted in 2018 - of iroko and mahogany by the famous Williams Boatyard in Falmouth, Cornwall, UK. This top range SY represents 73 feet of pure elegany. Avrea is a classic ship built with excellent materials and a lot of workmanship. As a traditionally built wooden boat of high quality, her interior is warm in winter and cool in summer; she never has problems with damp or humidity. The building is carvel planked with 50mm Iroko on laminated 100mm Iroko frames every 300mm. The fastenings are copper rivets, and all other bolts are of stainless steel. The decks are 20mm marine ply with 20mm teak planking. The rest of the boat on deck and down below is solid Brazilian mahogany. Mast supports is galvanised steel. The keel is 8 tons of cast iron, the chain plates and all fixtures on deck are either stainless steel or bronze. Bow cabin with two beds in V-shape, followed by heads on starboard. There is a complete pantry in U-form on starboard and a cosy dinette in front of it. Further back is the enormous saloon with the main entry. The saloon has a gangway on starboard with two beds on top of each other which leads to the big owner cabin including en suite heads and a separate access to the cockpit. On mid-ship and port is the engine room with its working area. There is an invoice with V.A.T. paid on the bare hull from 1977.


Algemeen
Rompvorm: Painted 2018

Accommodatie
Hutten: 3 Double cabins and 2 bathrooms

Motor, electra, water

Bezaan: 34 M2

Aantal masten: Standing rigging new 2018, masts removed and painted in 2018

name: 2009 Seaway Shipman 72, Sloop2009 Seaway Shipman 72, Sloop
description:
GEOMETRY is a stunning example of a high performance, shorthanded capable, carbon composite, family sailing yacht. Laden with top quality hardware and race-proven technology above deck, and an abundance of space and luxury below, she is a truly impressive performance sailor’s yacht, in every respect. The master stateroom offers a double berth, settee, dressing table, large wardrobe and a spacious en-suite head with wash basin and shower. The starboard and port aft staterooms, both offer convertible twin / double berths with well-appointed hanging lockers, storage and en-suite heads with wash basins and separate showers. A further double guest bed is available from the purpose designed conversion in the main saloon. The bright and spacious saloon and galley are surrounded by large windows which fill the area with natural light, giving a capacious feel to the living area. Complete with a well-appointed galley and a large 'U' shaped seating area for lounging or dining. The chart table is both well served for both space and digital communication. The Crew cabin has independent access, forward and comprises of twin bunks with heads and a shower.
Accommodation for up to 8 guests in 3 en-suite guest staterooms, including a full beam master stateroom and convertible saloon.Mehr anzeigen

The current owner purchased BELLA UNO in 2013 and commissioned a complete no expense spared, top-to-bottom refit, which was completed in 2015. description:
RED CARPET is a beautiful 22 m sailing yacht. She has 3 comfortable cabins and has been designed as a winning racing boat, equipped with cutting-edge technology to meet the expectations of the passionate sailor that wants to spend his sailing holiday on a high performing, fast, fun and sporty yacht. RED CARPET is all carbon made. Her sleek and fast water lines guarantee excellent hydrodynamic features. The wide sail area with Millennium technology ensures impressive performance, both with light breeze, and with challenging weather conditions. The clean, modern and elegant outdoor deck, gives RED CARPET a strong and unique personality and all the comfort of a cruise yacht. The deck, made with teak, has several fore and aft sunbathing areas. Two unique aft double chaise longue with cushions, reclining both ways, were made for guests that wish to relax and enjoy the sun and sea-breeze in comfort, even while sailing. The cockpit is equipped with a large pull-out table where guests can comfortably dine whilst enjoying the sea view.
RED CARPET can accommodate up to 6 guests. All 3 cabins have twin beds and their own private bathrooms, with separate overhead shower and many convenient storage compartments.Mehr anzeigen

Voormalig Loodsboot omgebouwd naar Zeilkotter, 12 slaapplaatsen, eigenaars hut, geschikt voor bewoning, ruim en vernieuwd stuurhuis, + boegspriet 27 m


Voormalig Loodsboot uit Duitse Loodskotter uit ca. 1960 met CVO keuring en certificaat uit 2019.  Huidige eigenaar heeft het schip in 1999 gekocht en in 2000 gerestaureerd met het plan er mee de wereld over te zeilen. Het is bij een plan gebleven Totaal gedurende de jaren geinvesteerd ca. € 350.000,- Romp is gekeurd in 2017. Het kleine dekhuis is door een groter dekhuis vervangen en het schip is verder uitgerust met twee stalen masten met compete set zeilen in 2009 en tevens nieuwe verstaging. Deze zeilende kotter heeft een ruime verwarmde salon met u-zit in het dekhuis, met boekenkast. eigenaarshut achter onder het dekhuis en een slaapzaal met 12 kooien en kan uitstekend als comfortabel varend en zeilend woonschip worden gebruikt. Er is nog veel werk te verrichten aan dit schip.  
Ook als charterschip te gebruiken voor max 12 passagiers De motor is een betrouwbare probleemloze Suzker Diesel motor met 300 pk
Motor is geklokt voor boven de 90%
Inruil is bespreekbaar.
Een kleiner eventueel bewoonbaar schip bij voorkeur  motorboot of motorsailer.
Boot voldoet aan alle normen en is CVO gekeurd

name: 2001 One Design Custom 702001 One Design Custom 70
description:
Wow - what a yacht!  If you are looking for a true head turner this is the boat for you. The design brief was grace, pace and space whilst being easy to sail either singlehanded or fully crewed.  We have sailed Madam ourselves and can testify to her sailing ability and user friendliness.  Her well thought out rigging systems allow the helmsman to sail her in all conditions without leaving the helm.  You will passage plan at 8 knots and 220 mile days are easily attained.  She was locally built by skilled craftsmen to a very high standard in the well proven wood/epoxy cold moulded system.  This gives a light, strong structure with all the beauty of traditional construction without the high maintenance.  Her hull is coated with Epifanes two pack varnish giving a durable long lasting finish that is a joy to behold.  A true modern classic, she is simply gorgeous. The owner has a new project in the offing and she must be sold. He's a very motivated seller!
Viewing by appointment only through our Suffolk Office 01473 659 681.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2021 Sunreef 702021 Sunreef 70
description:
With her outstanding living spaces, the Sunreef 70 balances extreme comfort, great performance under sail and advanced technology. A fully-customizable model, she offers an infinite variety of custom layouts and décors. The yacht’s hull and superstructure were designed to maximize living space and seaworthiness.
Added to the range In response to demand for a yacht to “fill the gap” between the popular 60 and 80 sailing catamarans we can expect that the 70 will include many of the favourites from her larger and smaller sisters. There will be a choice of galley down and galley up options with up to 6 cabins all with ensuite to appeal to both private owners and charter operators alike.
The fly bridge will be an open plan space for you to create your dream outdoor living area. As the 70 is another member of the family expect her to include the famous Sunreef quality from keel to mast tip, everything is put together properly using high quality materials and finishes.
As with all Sunreef Catamarans you will enjoy the freedom to create interior and exterior features that suit you, nothing is off the table, you ask for it and Sunreef will deliver!
Please do get in touch with S6 Marine for more information on this yacht.

name: 2021 Ice Yachts Ice 702021 Ice Yachts Ice 70
description:
INGLESE
 Thalassa2 was built from December 2019 to May 2021 at the Ice Yachts shipyard in Salvirola (CR). She is the number one of the new ICE70 model and has been supervised from the design stage by the Owner's Trustee Commander. It was judged the most elegant boat at the Cannes Boat Show 2021. The Owner personally chose the boat's furnishings, finishes, and accessories; the result is a fast, nautical, elegant and spacious boat. The choice of having only three cabins on board, a master cabin with a large double bed, a VIP cabin with two twin beds, and a third cabin for the crew, allows for ample dinette space, ideally divided into a dining/relaxation saloon and TV lounge. The aft galley is separated from the dinette by a sliding door, and is communicating with the crew cabin so that the entire aft area can be isolated to avoid disturbing the guests' and owner's relaxation. Her hull is made of a hybrid material composed of 70% GRP and 30% carbon, while the structure and deck reinforcements are full carbon for absolute hull rigidity. A powerful and silent 195 Hp Yanmar 4LV195 engine can propel her at over 11 knots and allows a respectable cruising speed. Equipped with a MaxSpare Carbon mast with Furling Boom and the brand new Doyle sails with Stratis and CableLess technology the boat performs magnificently under sail while remaining easy to handle with a smaller crew. The on-board electronics and home automation control of the systems are just the icing on a very tasty cake. In the dinette, a 24-inch mega-screen controls the entire life of the boat, while on the exterior consoles two 12-inch screens make navigation and data reading safe and easy. Thalassa2 was not born with racing in mind, so no repeaters were installed on the mast, choosing to place them on the leg of the cockpit table for better reading and easy and visible management of all the data. It is also for this reason that the boat is equipped not only with a large and comfortable Sprayhood but also with a fixed Bimini (which can be removed with simple operations) that protects the cockpit and therefore the seats and table from the sun and weather. The boat has a large sail locker, equipped by the skipper with supports and "beds" for equipment and sails, and a large Hangar Garage that houses an Aermarine aluminium keel dinghy with a 20Hp motor, which is as easy to dock as it is to retrieve with an electric winch. The interior is elegant and spacious: the owner's cabin in the bow has been insulated to make it soundproof from the rest of the boat. In addition to a large double bed, with plenty of storage underneath, it has a desk with a bookcase, two wardrobes and a large bathroom with a separate shower divided by glass doors. The guest cabin with two wide twin beds also has a bathroom with separate shower, again divided by a glass door. The two bathrooms, owner's and VIP, are furnished with a heater that guarantees comfort even in winter while drying the towels. The dinette is vast; ideally divided into a dining/aperitif area with a teak table with carbon inlays and electrically adjustable height legs, it has a large sofa that can also be used as a bed when sailing, or can be converted into a reading sofa. A lounge separated in height from the dinette is dedicated to TV entertainment. The galley, separated from the dinette by a beautiful sliding/swinging door, is equipped with everything you would want at home: an induction hob, which can also be used while sailing as it can be tilted and controlled with the on-board inverter, with a ventilated combi oven and microwave. Two large fridges overhang a freezer where stocks can be kept for a long time. An ice-maker and a small but functional dishwasher complete the package. Coffee machine and accessories are housed in large lockers and cabinets with glass doors, and the worktop is in Corian. The crew cabin is symmetrical to the galley and communicates with it. The construction philosophy was to create a crew area that is completely isolated from the dinette so as to favour the privacy of the owner and guests. The crew cabin has a single bed, and a second pull-out bed for sailing needs. Bathroom in the cabin. There is also a fourth daytime bathroom accessible from the dinette where, in addition to a wardrobe wardrobe, there is room for waxed, even wet ones. All bathrooms are equipped with electric toilets with built-in bidets. The boat is CE compliant and therefore equipped with black and grey water collection boxes. A powerful 12 KVA Mase generator and a 24V desalinator that produces 150 litres per hour of fresh water complete the on-board equipment. Given the boat's length, manoeuvring is aided by a powerful bow truster and an equally effective stern truster to make mooring manoeuvres easy and safe.  Boat offered with exclusive sales contract. Authorised shipping brokerage company. Book your private live video visit. 45 minutes just for you. See the complete sheet directly on our website ABAYACHTING. The data in this sheet are not to be considered contractual.
ITALIANO
 Thalassa2 è stata costruita dal Dicembre 2019 al Maggio 2021 nei cantieri Ice Yachts di Salvirola (CR). È la numero uno del nuovo modello ICE70 ed è stata seguita sin dalla progettazione dal Comandante fiduciario dell’Armatore. È stata giudicata la barca più elegante del Salone di Cannes 2021. L’Armatore ha scelto personalmente arredi, finiture, e accessori della barca; il risultato è una barca veloce, marina, elegante e spaziosa. La scelta di avere solo tre cabine a bordo, una armatoriale con un ampio letto matrimoniale, una cabina vip con due letti gemelli, e una terza cabina per l’equipaggio, permette di avere degli ampi spazi della dinette, divisa idealmente in salone pranzo/relax e salottino TV. La cucina a poppa è separata da una porta scorrevole dalla dinette, ed è comunicante con la cabina equipaggio per poter isolare tutta la zona di poppa per non disturbare il relax degli ospiti e dell’armatore. Ha lo scafo in materiale ibrido composto dal 70% di Vetroresina e il 30% in carbonio mentre rinforzi strutture e coperta sono full carbon per una rigidità assoluta dello scafo. Un potente e silenzioso motore Yanmar 4LV195 da 195 Hp la può spingere a più di 11 nodi e permette una velocità di crociera di tutto rispetto. Attrezzata con un albero in Carbonio MaxSpare con Furling Boom e delle nuovissime Vele Doyle con tecnologia Stratis e CableLess la barca si comporta magnificamente a vela, pur rimanendo facile da gestire con equipaggio ridotto. L’elettronica di bordo e il controllo domotico degli impianti sono solo la ciliegina su una torta molto gustosa. In Dinette un mega schermo a 24 pollici controlla tutta la vita della barca, mentre sulle consolle esterne due schermi da 12 pollici rendono sicura e facilmente visibile la navigazione e la lettura dei dati relativi. Thalassa2 non è nata con il pensiero della regata; non sono quindi stati istallati ripetitori all’albero, scegliendo di posizionarli sulla gamba del tavolo di pozzetto per una miglior lettura e una gestione di tutti i dati facile e visibile. Sempre per questa ragione la barca è dotata oltre che di un ampio e comodo Sprayhood anche di un Bimini fisso (ma smontabile con semplici operazioni) che protegge il pozzetto e quindi le sedute e il tavolo dal sole e dalle intemperie. La barca ha una ampia cala vele, attrezzata dallo skipper con supporti e “letti” per attrezzatura e vele, e di un ampio Hangar Garage che ospita un gommone con chiglia in alluminio della Aermarine con motore di 20Hp, facile da ammarare quanto da recuperare con un apposito winch elettrico. Gli interni sono eleganti e spaziosi: la cabina armatoriale a prua è stata coibentata per renderla insonorizzata dal resto della barca. Oltre ad un ampio letto matrimoniale, con una grande capacità di stivaggio al di sotto, ha una scrivania con libreria, due armadi guardaroba e un ampio bagno con doccia separata divisa da porte in cristallo. La cabina ospiti dottata di due letti gemelli di ampia larghezza, ha anche questa il bagno con doccia separata, sempre da una porta in cristallo. I due bagni, armatoriale e vip, sono arredati con un termoriscaldatore che garantisce confort anche di inverno asciugando nel contempo la biancheria da bagno.La dinette è vasta; divisa idealmente in zona pranzo/aperitivo con tavolo in teak con intarsi in carbonio con gambe ad altezza regolabile elettricamente, ha un ampio divano utilizzabile in navigazione anche come letto, o convertibile in divano da lettura. Un salottino separato per altezza dalla dinette è dedicato all’intrattenimento tv. La cucina separata dalla dinette con una bellissima porta scorrevole/battente è dotata di tutto ciò che si vorrebbe a casa: piano di cottura a induzione, utilizzabile anche in navigazione in quanto basculante e gestibile con l’inverter di bordo, con annesso un forno combinato ventilato e microonde. Due ampi frigoriferi sovrastano un freezer dove conservare le scorte per molto tempo. Completano il tutto un fabbricatore di ghiaccio e una piccola ma funzionale lavastoviglie. Macchina del caffè e accessori trovano ricovero in ampi armadietti e mobiletti con ante in vetro, e il piano di lavoro è in corian. La cabina equipaggio è simmetrica alla cucina e comunicante con questa. La filosofia costruttiva è stata di realizzare un settore equipaggio, completamente isolato dalla dinette in modo da poter favorire la privacy dell’armatore e degli ospiti.La cabina equipaggio ha un letto singolo, e un secondo letto estraibile per le necessità di navigazione. Bagno in cabina. Completa il tutto un quarto bagno diurno accessibile dalla Dinette dove, oltre ad un armadio guardaroba trovano posto le cerate anche bagnate. Tutti i bagni sono dotati di toilette elettriche con bidet incorporato. La barca è a norme CE e quindi dotata di casse per la raccolta delle acqua nere e grigie. Completano le dotazioni di bordo un potente generatore Mase da 12 KVA e un dissalatore a 24V che produce 150Litri ora di acqua dolce. Data la lunghezza della barca in manovra si è aiutati da un potente bow truster e da un altrettanto efficace stern truster in modo da rendere facili e sicure le manovre di ormeggio.  Imbarcazione proposta con contratto di vendita in esclusiva. Società di mediazione marittima autorizzata. Prenota la tua video-visita privata in diretta. 45 minuti solo per te. Guarda la scheda completa direttamente sul nostro sito internet ABAYACHTING. I dati riportati nella presente scheda non sono da ritenersi contrattuali.
FRANCESE
Thalassa2 a été construit de décembre 2019 à mai 2021 au chantier naval Ice Yachts de Salvirola (CR). Il est le numéro un du nouveau modèle ICE70 et a été supervisé dès la conception par le Commandant du Trustee du propriétaire. Il a été jugé comme le bateau le plus élégant au salon nautique de Cannes 2021. Le Propriétaire a personnellement choisi l'ameublement, les finitions et les accessoires du bateau ; le résultat est un bateau rapide, nautique, élégant et spacieux. Le choix de n'avoir que trois cabines à bord, une cabine de maître avec un grand lit double, une cabine VIP avec deux lits jumeaux, et une troisième cabine pour l'équipage, permet de disposer d'un vaste espace dinette, idéalement divisé en un salon de repas/détente et un salon TV. La cuisine arrière est séparée de la dînette par une porte coulissante, et communique avec la cabine de l'équipage de sorte que toute la zone arrière peut être isolée pour ne pas perturber la détente des invités et du propriétaire. Sa coque est faite d'un matériau hybride composé de 70% de GRP et 30% de carbone, tandis que la structure et les renforts de pont sont entièrement en carbone pour une rigidité absolue de la coque. Un puissant et silencieux moteur Yanmar 4LV195 de 195 Hp peut le propulser à plus de 11 nœuds et lui permet une vitesse de croisière respectable. Equipé d'un mât MaxSpare Carbon avec bôme à enrouleur et des toutes nouvelles voiles Doyle avec technologie Stratis et CableLess, le bateau se comporte magnifiquement sous voile tout en restant facile à manier avec un équipage réduit. L'électronique embarquée et le contrôle domotique des systèmes ne sont que la cerise sur un gâteau très savoureux. Dans la dinette, un méga-écran de 24 pouces contrôle toute la vie du bateau, tandis que sur les consoles extérieures, deux écrans de 12 pouces rendent la navigation et la lecture des données sûres et faciles. Thalassa2 n'étant pas né dans l'optique de la course, aucun répétiteur n'a été installé sur le mât, préférant les placer sur le pied de la table du cockpit pour une meilleure lecture et une gestion facile et visible de toutes les données. C'est aussi pour cette raison que le bateau est équipé non seulement d'un grand et confortable Sprayhood mais aussi d'un Bimini fixe (qui peut être enlevé avec des opérations simples) qui protège le cockpit et donc les sièges et la table du soleil et des intempéries. Le bateau dispose d'une grande soute à voile, équipée par le skipper de supports et de "lits" pour les équipements et les voiles, et d'un grand Garage Hangar qui abrite un dériveur Aermarine à quille en aluminium avec un moteur de 20Hp, qui est aussi facile à amarrer qu'à récupérer avec un treuil électrique. L'intérieur est élégant et spacieux : la cabine du propriétaire, située à l'avant, a été isolée pour la rendre insonorisée du reste du bateau. En plus d'un grand lit double, avec de nombreux rangements en dessous, elle dispose d'un bureau avec une bibliothèque, de deux armoires et d'une grande salle de bain avec une douche séparée divisée par des portes en verre. La cabine d'invités avec deux larges lits jumeaux dispose également d'une salle de bain avec douche séparée, elle aussi divisée par une porte en verre. Les deux salles de bains, celle du propriétaire et la VIP, sont équipées d'un chauffage qui garantit le confort même en hiver pendant le séchage des serviettes. La dînette est vaste ; idéalement divisée en zone repas/apéritif avec une table en teck avec des incrustations en carbone et des pieds à hauteur réglable électriquement, elle dispose d'un grand canapé qui peut également servir de lit en navigation, ou être transformé en canapé de lecture. Un salon séparé en hauteur de la dînette est dédié au divertissement télévisuel. La cuisine, séparée de la dînette par une belle porte coulissante/basculante, est équipée de tout ce que vous souhaitez avoir à la maison : une plaque à induction, qui peut également être utilisée en navigation car elle peut être inclinée et contrôlée par l'onduleur de bord, avec un four combiné ventilé et un micro-ondes. Deux grands réfrigérateurs surplombent un congélateur où l'on peut conserver les stocks pendant une longue période. Une machine à glaçons et un lave-vaisselle petit mais fonctionnel complètent l'ensemble. La machine à café et les accessoires sont logés dans de grands casiers et armoires avec des portes en verre, et le plan de travail est en Corian. La cabine de l'équipage est symétrique à la cuisine et communique avec elle. La philosophie de construction a été de créer un espace équipage complètement isolé de la dînette afin de favoriser l'intimité du propriétaire et des invités. La cabine de l'équipage dispose d'un lit simple et d'un deuxième lit escamotable pour les besoins de la navigation. Salle de bain dans la cabine. Il y a également une quatrième salle de bain de jour accessible depuis la dinette où, en plus d'une penderie, il y a de la place pour les cirés, même humides. Toutes les salles de bain sont équipées de toilettes électriques avec bidet intégré. Le bateau est conforme à la norme CE et est donc équipé de boîtes de collecte des eaux noires et grises. Un puissant générateur Mase de 12 KVA et un dessalinisateur 24V qui produit 150 litres d'eau douce par heure complètent l'équipement de bord. Compte tenu de la longueur du bateau, les manœuvres sont facilitées par un puissant truster d'étrave et un truster de poupe tout aussi efficace pour rendre les manœuvres d'amarrage faciles et sûres.  Bateau offert avec un contrat de vente exclusif. Société de courtage maritime agréée. Réservez votre visite vidéo privée en direct. 45 minutes rien que pour vous. Voir la fiche complète directement sur notre site ABAYACHTING. Les données de cette fiche ne sont pas à considérer comme contractuelles.
TEDESCO
Thalassa2 wurde von Dezember 2019 bis Mai 2021 auf der Werft Ice Yachts in Salvirola (CR) gebaut. Sie ist die Nummer eins des neuen ICE70-Modells und wurde von der Entwurfsphase an vom Owner's Trustee Commander betreut. Sie wurde auf der Cannes Boat Show 2021 zum elegantesten Boot gekürt. Der Eigner hat die Einrichtung, die Oberflächen und das Zubehör des Bootes persönlich ausgewählt; das Ergebnis ist ein schnelles, nautisches, elegantes und geräumiges Boot. Die Entscheidung, nur drei Kabinen an Bord zu haben, eine Eignerkabine mit einem großen Doppelbett, eine VIP-Kabine mit zwei Einzelbetten und eine dritte Kabine für die Besatzung, ermöglicht einen großzügigen Platz, der ideal in einen Ess-/Entspannungssalon und eine TV-Lounge unterteilt ist. Die Heckküche ist durch eine Schiebetür von der Dinette getrennt und steht mit der Crewkabine in Verbindung, so dass der gesamte hintere Bereich isoliert werden kann, um die Entspannung der Gäste und des Eigners nicht zu stören. Der Rumpf besteht aus einem Hybridmaterial, das zu 70% aus GFK und zu 30% aus Karbon besteht, während die Struktur und die Decksverstärkungen vollständig aus Karbon bestehen, um eine absolute Steifigkeit des Rumpfes zu gewährleisten. Ein leistungsstarker und geräuscharmer 195 PS Yanmar 4LV195 Motor treibt das Schiff auf über 11 Knoten an und ermöglicht eine respektable Reisegeschwindigkeit. Ausgestattet mit einem MaxSpare Carbon-Mast mit Rollbaum und den brandneuen Doyle-Segeln mit Stratis- und CableLess-Technologie zeigt das Boot hervorragende Leistungen unter Segeln und ist auch mit einer kleineren Crew leicht zu handhaben. Die Bordelektronik und die Hausautomationssteuerung der Systeme sind nur das Sahnehäubchen auf einem sehr leckeren Kuchen. In der Dinette steuert ein 24-Zoll-Megabildschirm das gesamte Leben auf dem Boot, während auf den Außenkonsolen zwei 12-Zoll-Bildschirme die Navigation und das Ablesen von Daten sicher und einfach machen. Da die Thalassa2 nicht für den Rennsport konzipiert wurde, wurden keine Repeater am Mast installiert, sondern an den Beinen des Cockpittischs, um die Daten besser ablesen und einfach und sichtbar verwalten zu können. Aus diesem Grund ist das Boot nicht nur mit einer großen und bequemen Sprayhood ausgestattet, sondern auch mit einem festen Bimini (das mit einfachen Handgriffen abgenommen werden kann), das das Cockpit und damit die Sitze und den Tisch vor Sonne und Wetter schützt. Das Boot verfügt über einen großen Segelschrank, der vom Skipper mit Stützen und "Betten" für Ausrüstung und Segel ausgestattet wurde, und eine große Hangar-Garage, in der ein Aermarine Aluminium-Kielboot mit einem 20-PS-Motor untergebracht ist, das sich mit einer elektrischen Winde ebenso leicht anlegen wie bergen lässt. Der Innenraum ist elegant und geräumig: Die Eignerkabine im Bug wurde isoliert, um sie vom Rest des Bootes schalldicht zu machen. Neben einem großen Doppelbett mit viel Stauraum darunter verfügt sie über einen Schreibtisch mit Bücherregal, zwei Kleiderschränke und ein großes Bad mit einer durch Glastüren abgetrennten Dusche. Die Gästekabine mit zwei breiten Einzelbetten verfügt ebenfalls über ein Bad mit separater Dusche, ebenfalls durch eine Glastür getrennt. Die beiden Bäder, das Eigner- und das VIP-Bad, sind mit einer Heizung ausgestattet, die auch im Winter beim Trocknen der Handtücher für Komfort sorgt. Die Dinette ist riesig; ideal aufgeteilt in einen Ess-/Aperitifbereich mit einem Teakholztisch mit Carboneinlagen und elektrisch höhenverstellbaren Beinen, verfügt sie über ein großes Sofa, das beim Segeln auch als Bett genutzt oder in ein Lesesofa verwandelt werden kann. Eine in der Höhe von der Essecke getrennte Lounge ist der TV-Unterhaltung gewidmet. Die Kombüse, die durch eine schöne Schiebe-/Schwenktür von der Essecke getrennt ist, ist mit allem ausgestattet, was man sich zu Hause wünscht: ein Induktionskochfeld, das auch während des Segelns benutzt werden kann, da es mit dem Bordinverter gekippt und gesteuert werden kann, mit einem belüfteten Kombi-Ofen und einer Mikrowelle. Zwei große Kühlschränke überragen einen Gefrierschrank, in dem Vorräte lange gelagert werden können. Ein Eisbereiter und ein kleiner, aber funktioneller Geschirrspüler vervollständigen das Paket. Kaffeemaschine und Zubehör sind in großen Fächern und Schränken mit Glastüren untergebracht, und die Arbeitsfläche besteht aus Corian. Die Mannschaftskabine ist symmetrisch zur Kombüse angeordnet und steht mit ihr in Verbindung. Die Konstruktionsphilosophie bestand darin, einen Bereich für die Besatzung zu schaffen, der von der Essecke völlig isoliert ist, um die Privatsphäre des Eigners und der Gäste zu wahren. Die Crew-Kabine verfügt über ein Einzelbett und ein zweites ausziehbares Bett für den Segelbedarf. Badezimmer in der Kabine. Es gibt auch ein viertes Badezimmer für den Tag, das von der Dinette aus zugänglich ist, wo neben einem Kleiderschrank auch Platz für gewachste, sogar nasse Sachen ist. Alle Bäder sind mit elektrischen Toiletten mit eingebauten Bidets ausgestattet. Das Boot ist CE-konform und daher mit Schwarz- und Grauwassersammelboxen ausgestattet. Ein leistungsstarker 12 KVA Mase-Generator und ein 24-Volt-Entsalzer, der 150 Liter Frischwasser pro Stunde produziert, vervollständigen die Ausstattung an Bord. Angesichts der Länge des Bootes wird das Manövrieren durch einen leistungsstarken Bugtruster und einen ebenso effektiven Hecktruster unterstützt, um Anlegemanöver einfach und sicher zu machen.  Das Boot wird mit exklusivem Kaufvertrag angeboten. Autorisiertes Schiffsmaklerunternehmen. Buchen Sie Ihre private Live-Video-Besichtigung. 45 Minuten nur für Sie. Sehen Sie das vollständige Datenblatt direkt auf unserer Website ABAYACHTING. Die Daten in diesem Blatt sind nicht als vertraglich zu betrachten.
SPAGNOLO
Thalassa2 fue construido desde diciembre de 2019 hasta mayo de 2021 en el astillero Ice Yachts de Salvirola (CR). Es el número uno del nuevo modelo ICE70 y ha sido supervisado desde la fase de diseño por el Comandante Fiduciario del Armador. Fue juzgado como el barco más elegante en el Salón Náutico de Cannes 2021. El Propietario eligió personalmente el mobiliario, los acabados y los accesorios del barco; el resultado es un barco rápido, náutico, elegante y espacioso. La elección de tener sólo tres camarotes a bordo, un camarote principal con una gran cama doble, un camarote VIP con dos camas individuales y un tercer camarote para la tripulación, permite un amplio espacio de comedor, idealmente dividido en un salón de comedor/relax y un salón de televisión. La cocina de popa está separada de la dinette por una puerta corredera, y está comunicada con el camarote de la tripulación, de modo que toda la zona de popa puede aislarse para no perturbar el descanso de los invitados y del propietario. Su casco está fabricado con un material híbrido compuesto por un 70% de PRFV y un 30% de carbono, mientras que la estructura y los refuerzos de la cubierta son totalmente de carbono para una rigidez absoluta del casco. Un potente y silencioso motor Yanmar 4LV195 de 195 Hp puede propulsarlo a más de 11 nudos y permite una respetable velocidad de crucero. Equipado con un mástil de carbono MaxSpare con botavara enrollable y las nuevas velas Doyle con tecnología Stratis y CableLess, el barco se comporta magníficamente a vela sin dejar de ser fácil de manejar con una tripulación reducida. La electrónica de a bordo y el control domótico de los sistemas son sólo la guinda de un pastel muy sabroso. En la dinette, una megapantalla de 24 pulgadas controla toda la vida del barco, mientras que en las consolas exteriores dos pantallas de 12 pulgadas hacen que la navegación y la lectura de datos sean seguras y fáciles. El Thalassa2 no nació pensando en las regatas, por lo que no se instalaron repetidores en el mástil, optando por colocarlos en la pata de la mesa de la bañera para una mejor lectura y una gestión fácil y visible de todos los datos. Es también por esta razón que el barco está equipado no sólo con un amplio y cómodo Sprayhood, sino también con un Bimini fijo (que se puede quitar con simples operaciones) que protege la bañera y por lo tanto los asientos y la mesa del sol y el clima. El barco dispone de un gran cofre de velas, equipado por el patrón con soportes y "camas" para el equipo y las velas, y de un gran garaje Hangar que alberga una embarcación auxiliar de quilla de aluminio Aermarine con un motor de 20Hp, que es tan fácil de atracar como de recuperar con un cabrestante eléctrico. El interior es elegante y espacioso: el camarote del armador en la proa se ha aislado para insonorizarlo del resto del barco. Además de una gran cama doble, con mucho espacio de almacenamiento debajo, tiene un escritorio con librería, dos armarios y un gran baño con ducha separada dividida por puertas de cristal. El camarote de invitados, con dos amplias camas gemelas, también tiene un baño con ducha separada, de nuevo dividido por una puerta de cristal. Los dos cuartos de baño, el del propietario y el VIP, están equipados con un calefactor que garantiza la comodidad incluso en invierno mientras se secan las toallas. La dinette es amplia; idealmente dividida en zona de comedor/peritivo con una mesa de teca con incrustaciones de carbono y patas de altura regulable eléctricamente, cuenta con un gran sofá que también se puede utilizar como cama cuando se navega, o se puede convertir en un sofá de lectura. Un salón separado en altura de la dinette está dedicado al entretenimiento televisivo. La cocina, separada de la dinette por una bonita puerta corredera y giratoria, está equipada con todo lo que se puede desear en casa: una placa de inducción, que también se puede utilizar durante la navegación, ya que se puede inclinar y controlar con el inversor de a bordo, con un horno combinado ventilado y un microondas. Dos grandes frigoríficos sobresalen de un congelador en el que se pueden conservar las existencias durante mucho tiempo. Una máquina de hacer hielo y un pequeño pero funcional lavavajillas completan el conjunto. La cafetera y los accesorios están alojados en grandes armarios y vitrinas con puertas de cristal, y la encimera es de Corian. La cabina de la tripulación es simétrica a la cocina y se comunica con ella. La filosofía de construcción fue crear una zona para la tripulación completamente aislada de la dinette para favorecer la intimidad del propietario y los invitados. El camarote de la tripulación cuenta con una cama individual y una segunda cama extraíble para las necesidades de navegación. Baño en el camarote. También hay un cuarto baño de día accesible desde la dinette donde, además de un armario ropero, hay espacio para encerados, incluso mojados. Todos los baños están equipados con inodoros eléctricos con bidé incorporado. El barco cumple la normativa CE y, por tanto, está equipado con cajas de recogida de aguas negras y grises. Un potente generador Mase de 12 KVA y un desalinizador de 24 V que produce 150 litros por hora de agua dulce completan el equipamiento de a bordo. Dada la eslora de la embarcación, la maniobra se ve favorecida por un potente truster de proa y un truster de popa igualmente eficaz para hacer las maniobras de amarre fáciles y seguras.  Embarcación ofrecida con contrato de venta exclusiva. Empresa de corretaje marítimo autorizada. Reserve su visita privada con vídeo en directo. 45 minutos sólo para usted. name: 1991 Ta Chiao Scorpio 721991 Ta Chiao Scorpio 72
description:
Ce voilier présente de réelles qualités marines ainsi qu'un agréable aménagement intérieur.  Un ketch de de caractère que l’on navigue avec plaisir. Un grand bain de soleil le long du pont en teck, un cockpit protégé et chaleureux, des cabines avec chacune leur salle de bain individuelle, un intérieur élégant en teck massif décoré dans des bleus marins, la vie à bord de Scorpio 72 reste avant tout maritime et confortable.
English This sailboat has real marine qualities as well as a pleasant interior layout.  A ketch of character that we navigate with pleasure. A large sunbathing along the teak deck, a protected and warm cockpit, cabins each with their individual bathroom, an elegant interior in solid teak decorated in marine blues, life on board Scorpio 72 remains above all maritime and comfortable.
Italiano Questa barca a vela ha vere qualità marine e un piacevole layout interno.  Un ketch di carattere che navighiamo con piacere. Un grande prendisole lungo il ponte in teak, un pozzetto protetto e caldo, cabine ognuna con il proprio bagno individuale, un elegante interno in massello di teak decorato in blu marino, la vita a bordo di Scorpio 72 rimane soprattutto marittima e confortevole.
Deutsch Dieses Segelboot hat echte maritime Qualitäten sowie eine angenehme Innenaufteilung.  Eine Ketsch des Charakters, die wir mit Vergnügen navigieren. Ein großes Sonnenbaden entlang des Teakdecks, ein geschütztes und warmes Cockpit, Kabinen mit jeweils eigenem Bad, ein elegantes Interieur aus massivem Teakholz, das in Marineblau gehalten ist, das Leben an Bord der Scorpio 72 bleibt vor allem maritim und komfortabel.
Español Este velero tiene cualidades marinas reales, así como un diseño interior agradable.  Un ketch de carácter que navegamos con placer. Un gran baño de sol a lo largo de la cubierta de teca, una cabina protegida y cálida, cabinas cada una con su baño individual, un elegante interior en teca maciza decorada en azules marinos, la vida a bordo del Scorpio 72 sigue siendo sobre todo marítima y cómoda.
Россию Этот парусник обладает настоящими морскими качествами, а также приятной внутренней планировкой.  Кетч характера, которым мы ориентируемся с удовольствием. Большое загорание вдоль палубы из тикового дерева, защищенная и теплая кабина, каюты с каждой индивидуальной ванной комнатой, элегантный интерьер из массива тикового дерева, оформленный в морском блюзе, жизнь на борту Scorpio 72 остается прежде всего морской и комфортной.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1996 Oyster Cutter Rigged Sloop1996 Oyster Cutter Rigged Sloop
description:
In the exhaustive search for the right vessel to transport his family with five young children around the globe, in optimized comfort and safety, this owner finally decided on “Toad”. Finding a strong reliable cruising yacht with the long legs and five ensuite cabins, and all the associated features that “Toad” now offers, was a challenging quest. As “Apollonia” this Oyster 70 was found resting in the South of England, and so the story began. The owner’s requirement for no compromise on the technical performance of the yacht necessitated a substantial refit and upgrading and replacement of a large proportion of the vital technical components. The details of these improvements are contained in a separate list available to interested parties.
 
“Toad” was the chosen vessel for an 18 month long family cruise from Europe to New Zealand. She has proved immensely reliable, and fit for purpose. Her professional crew have continually maintained and upgraded her like no other yacht of this size or ilk. As a result, and with very little evidence of her painless and immensely successful cruise, she is offered in turnkey condition, ready to bring the same enjoyment to her next lucky owner. Toad continues to benefit from an extensive maintenance and upgrading program as she lies at her new berth in Imperia, Italy.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1991 Alu Marine JEROBOAM KETCH1991 Alu Marine JEROBOAM KETCH
description:
Built in aluminium by Alu Marine Shipyard in 1991 and designed by Phillipe Harle, Jaïpur is a twin-centerboard ketch of the «Jeroboam » class.
Jaipur offers spacious and well ventilated accommodation; a vast salon welcomes up to 8guests at its table, with a bar-fridge, hi-fi and television in close proximity.Each cabin is equipped with a double bed, wardrobe and storage space, along with aspacious private bathroom. The fore cabin offers a single bunk in which one person couldbe accommodated. The crew cabin is situated in the aft with its own bathroom.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1941 Baglietto Motorsailer Bermudan Ketch1941 Baglietto Motorsailer Bermudan Ketch
description:
The hull was built at the Baglietto Shipyard in Varazze between 1942 and 1943, together with 3 other sister navy ships, to be used as minesweepers. The program did not go ahead and one of these ships, was sold to Dr. Fassio, a ship owner who turned it into a pleasure vessel at the Cantieri Sturla in Genoa, under the direction of the than young English architect Laurent Giles.
The current owners bought the yacht in 1990 and after having reconstructed its history and retrieved project and documentation around Europe, between 2000 and 2009, submitted her to a radical refit at Cantieri De Carlo of Viareggio. In 2016, the boat has been submitted to an extra refit update. 

Flying Italian Commercial Flag.
Real SUPER conditions for a so old lady.Annual maintinance in progress, from April to half May.
Asking Price* € 360.000 now reduced to € 310.000 + vat, if due.

 
**This boat is Italian and as such, its sale is subject to Italian customs and practices on yachts brokerage, which state that the agency commission of 10% is paid in half between the seller and the buyer. The sale price published on this site is therefore calibrated so that the seller pays to the broker only 5% and does not include the other 5%, which must be paid directly by the buyer to the broker.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1914 AB Norvegian Galeas1914 AB Norvegian Galeas
description: LUN II was built for fishing in 1914 near Ålesund in Norway, she completed her initial career in 1976 with a significant refit at a shipyard, with changes to the engine and lengthening and widening modifications to the hull in 1956. This was common practice at the time, as it was less expensive than building from scratch. Acquired by her fourth owner in 1979, she was refurbished at the Ring Andersen shipyard in Denmark with a 14-year full refit to exact Norwegian and Germanischer Lloyd Standart. In 1996, she sailed to Ensenada in Mexico where she became a floating home for her owner, his wife and dogs.The last owner bought her in 2015, with the intention of turning her into a sailing cargo ship. Significant carpentry and engine work was carried out in 2016/2017 for this purpose. Several expeditions have been successfully completed since, with over 100 tonnes of cargo shipped across the Atlantic and a polar expedition in 2018/19.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1996 Devonport Challenge Business 671996 Devonport Challenge Business 67
description:
Dit zeiljacht is ontworpen en gebouwd voor de Global Challenge zeilenrace rond de wereld. Refit n 2013. Grootzeil en voorzeilen zijn van 2018.


Algemeen
Besturing: Stuurwiel hydraulisch elektrisch bekrachtigd
Ramen: Getinte kunststof ramen in RVS sponningen
Overig: 
Deze Challenge Business 67' heeft de Global Challenge 1 keer gevaren en had het zeilnummer CB35.
In 2013 heeft ze een refit ondergaan:

Romp en opbouw volledig nieuw gepoten;
 Flexi Teek dek is aangebracht;
 Interieur voorzien van nieuw plaatmateriaal en bekleding;
 De mast is gedemonteerd, gespoten en weer nieuw opgebouwd;
 Staand want is geïnspecteerd;
 Lopend want kompleet vervangen;
 Elektrische installatie deels vernieuwd;
 Merendeel van de pompen vernieuwd;
 Groot deel van de navigatie instrumenten vernieuwd
 Etc.

Twee jaar geleden zijn het grootzeil, de Yankee en de kotterfok vervangen. Hiermee is deze Challenge Business 67 klaar voor jarenlang vaarplezier over de wereldzeeën.

Accommodatie
Materiaal, kleuren: Wit plaatmateriaal
Verblijfsruimtes: Salon met gastenhut, Voorschip met 2 x gastenhut, Achterkajuit met eigenaarshut en gastenhut en materiaal opslagruimte
TV: Toshiba flatscreen
Kooktoestel & brandstof: Force 10 3 - pits gas
Overig: 
Uitgerust met LED interieurverlichting (2013), Zanussi wasmachine. 

Motor, electra, water
Koeling: Interkoeling
Voortstuwing: Schroefas water gesmeerd met Brunton Autoprop
Meetinstrumenten: Toerenteller, Watertemperatuur, Oliedruk (alle VDO)
Bedieningspaneel: 2 x Schakelpaneel 24 Volt en 1 x schakelpaneel 12 Volt
Dynamo: 150 A. 24 Volt
Watersysteem: Hydrofoor
Warm water: Ca. 45 liter boiler (verwarmd via motor en 220 Volt)
Watertank & materiaal: 1.100 Liter verdeeld over 4 RVS tanks
Watermaker: Aquafresh Watermakers Ltd. (2013 gereviseerd)
Voltmeter: 2 x
Watertankmeter: Tanktender

Tuigage
Type tuigage: Masttop kotter
Rondhouten, verstaging: Norseman Gibb Dyform RVS en 1 x 19 RVS draad; vernieuwd in 2000, gekeurd in 2009 en waar nodig vervangen en gekeurd in 2013
Lieren: 2 x Harken 66.2 2-speed elektrisch, 1 x Harken 53 1-speed elektrisch, 6 x Harken 56.2 2-speed, 2 x Harken 53 2-speed 
Genua: Yankee: Gaastra 97,4 m2 (2018)
Genua reefsysteem: Harken MK III
Fok: Kotterfok: Gaastra (2018)
Voorzeil rolsysteem : Harken MK IV 3
Aantal masten: Aluminium, Atlantic Spars Ltd, Brixham, Devon; In 2013 volledig gedemonteerd en gespoten
Overig: 
2 x Carbon Fibre spi-boom

Uitrusting
Ankerlier: Muir VR/VRC4000 elektrisch
Dekzeil(en): Zonnetent over de giek
Zwemtrap: RVS
Zeerailing: RVS

Veiligheid
Gasbun met afvoer: Geschikt voor 2 flessen

name: 2012 Maxi Dolphin NACIRA 672012 Maxi Dolphin NACIRA 67
description:
With over twenty years of experience in the sailing market, the Italian shipyard Maxi Dolphin, known for producing one-off yachts, has followed its natural evolution and now launches the 20m sailing yacht Dream 67 SHAMLOR.
SHAMLOR is made both for leisure or race and is described as "the most powerful leisure yacht worldwide, able to reach speeds in excess of 30 knots – with a sea view from the dining table!"
She features plenty of discretely packaged race technology, including light Karver headsail furlers driven via endless Dyneema loops from the powerful electric winches aft – much lighter than electrical furlers. A big single-spreader Lorima rotating wing mast, a powerful sailplan, plenty of form stability from the wide hull plus a canting keel are more than enough reasons for extra crew to be added when Shamlor starts racing last summer.Mehr anzeigen
