name: 1986 Custom Sciarrelli Bugeye Schooner1986 Custom Sciarrelli Bugeye Schooner
description:
Schooner costruito in cedro del Libano nel 1986 dal maestro d’ascia Piero Crosato su disegni di Carlo Sciarrelli (nr. 106*).  Il progetto deriva dallo Schooner St. Ann del 1736, ed è la versione definitiva del prototipo n. 90 San Nicolò. L’armo è a bug-eye schooner, tipico degli schooner da lavoro americani. La barca è stata acquisita nel 2015 da un nuovo armatore specializzato in restauro di scafi d’epoca, che l’ha totalmente restaurata mantenendone l’originalità.  Barca pronta alla boa sempre ben mantenuta dall'armatore.
English Schooner built of Lebanon cedar in 1986 by the axe master Piero Crosato to designs by Carlo Sciarrelli (b. 106*).  The project is derived from the Schooner St. Ann of 1736, and is the final version of prototype No. 90 San Nicolò. The arm is a bug-eye schooner, typical of American work schooners. The boat was acquired in 2015 by a new owner specialized in the restoration of vintage hulls, which has totally restored it while maintaining its originality.  Boat ready for the buoy always well maintained by the owner.
Française Goélette construite en cèdre du Liban en 1986 par le maître de hache Piero Crosato sur des dessins de Carlo Sciarrelli (né le 106*).  Le projet est dérivé de la Schooner St. Ann de 1736, et est la version finale du prototype n ° 90 San Nicolò. Le bras est une goélette à œil bug, typique des goélettes de travail américaines. Le bateau a été acquis en 2015 par un nouveau propriétaire spécialisé dans la restauration de coques vintage, qui l’a totalement restauré tout en conservant son originalité.  Bateau prêt pour la bouée toujours bien entretenue par le propriétaire.
Deutsch Schooner wurde 1986 von dem Axtmeister Piero Crosato nach Entwürfen von Carlo Sciarrelli (geb. 106*) gebaut.  Das Projekt stammt von der Schooner St. Ann von 1736 und ist die endgültige Version des Prototyps Nr. 90 San Nicolé. Der Arm ist ein Bug-Eye-Schoner, typisch für amerikanische Arbeitsschoner. Das Boot wurde im Jahr 2015 von einem neuen Besitzer erworben, der auf die Restaurierung von Vintage-Rümpfen spezialisiert ist, die es vollständig restauriert hat, während seine Originalität erhalten bleibt.  Boot bereit für die Boje immer gut gepflegt durch den Besitzer.
Español Schooner construido de cedro del Líbano en 1986 por el maestro de hachas Piero Crosato a los diseños de Carlo Sciarrelli (n. 106*).  El proyecto se deriva del Schooner St. Ann de 1736, y es la versión final del prototipo No. 90 San Nicolá. El brazo es una goleta de ojo de bicho, típica de las escuelas de trabajo estadounidenses. El barco fue adquirido en 2015 por un nuevo propietario especializado en la restauración de cascos vintage, que lo ha restaurado totalmente manteniendo su originalidad.  Barco listo para la boya siempre bien mantenido por el propietario.
Россию Schooner построен из ливанского кедра в 1986 году топор мастер Пьеро Crosato по проектам Карло Sciarrelli (р. 106 ").  Проект основан на Шхунер Сент-Энн 1736 года и является окончательной версией прототипа No 90 Сан-Николо. Рука - шхуна с клопами для глаз, типичная для американских рабочих шхун. Лодка была приобретена в 2015 году новым владельцем, специализирующимся на реставрации винтажных корпусов, что полностью восстановило ее, сохранив при этом ее оригинальность.  Лодка, готовая к бую, всегда хорошо поддерживается владельцем.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1997 Kanter 58 Pilothouse1997 Kanter 58 Pilothouse
location: Westcoast France, visits on appointment, Niederlande
description:
Prachtig gelijnd dekhuis zeiljacht van eerste eigenaar. Zorgzaam onderhouden, met o.a. nieuwe voorzeilen van 2020, verstaging en elektronica-set


Dit prachtig gelijnde zeiljacht is van de eerste eigenaar en is altijd in top conditie gehouden en is klaar om te gaan. Ondanks dat het jacht ter overname aangeboden heeft, blijft de eigenaar het jacht optimaal verzorgen, met periodiek onderhoud en diverse vernieuwingen. Zo is het jacht uitgerust met o.a. nieuwe voorzeilen van 2020, is het staand want preventief vervangen en is het jacht 2022 voorzien van nieuwe navigatie-elektronica. In  Zeer geschikt om in comfort rond de wereld te zeilen en daarom voorzien van alle denkbare opties. 
 


Algemeen
Rompvorm: 8 mm
Roer: Semi balanced
Besturing: + Cetrek joystick besturing in pilothouse
Overig: 
Romp en opbouw zijn van zeewaterbestendig aluminium (5083). Romp: 8mm, opbouw: 5mm. In de romp midscheeps is een zwemtrap geintegreerd. 
Voor extra veiligheid is de romp voorzien van 4 waterdichte schotten.
De romp en dekken zijn geisoleerd met 25 mm schuim. 
De eigenaren zorgen ervoor dat het schip in perfecte staat blijft. Werkzaamheden 2017/2018:

Romp geschilderd. 
Teakdekken vernieuwd. Teak op kajuitdak overhaald en waar nodig vervangen. 
Lewmar luiken opnieuw gemonteerd en ramen vernieuwd,
Nieuwe bekleding in salon en achterhut,
Nieuwe Force 10 oven,
Gas koelsystemen gecontroleerd,
Pakking toiletten en pomp vervangen,
Nieuwe digital Easy Navtex,
Nieuwe Mastervolt 100 amp lader, Balmar 50 amp dynamo vervangen voor 100 amp,
Lieren en fok roller onderhoudsbeurt,
Caterpillar onderhoudsbeurt en waterpomp vervangen,
Westerbeke onderhoudsbeurt en waterpomp vervangen,
Lewmar boegschroef onderhoudsbeurt,
Maxprop onderhoudsbeurt,
CV onderhoudsbeurt,
Yamaha bbm onderhoudsbeurt,
Romp gepolijst,
Opbouw opnieuw gespoten,
Houtwerk buiten opnieuw gevernist,
Onderwaterschip nieuwe antifouling en anodes vervangen,
Reddingsvlot servicebeurt. 
Nieuwe seals ramen.

Deze Kanter wordt door haar huidige en eerste eigenaar permanent in uitmuntende conditie gehouden, met diverse (preventieve) vernieuwingen waar nodig. In september 2021 is het jacht op de wal geweest voor onderhoud, waarbij de volgende zaken uitgevoerd zijn.

Nieuwe antifouling
Vervangen van anodes, Maxprop-anodes en boegschroeg-anodes
Olie boegschroef vervangen
Vervangen van roerkoningpakkingen
Vevrangen van stuurkabels
Smeren van alle afsluiters

Aansluitend begin 2022 voorzien van:

8 nieuwe Mastervolt AGM accu's 900amp/24 Volt
Complete nieuwe elektronica-set 

 

Accommodatie
TV: Samsung 24 inch
Kooktoestel & brandstof: Force 10
Overig: 
In het achterschip bevindt zich de eigenaarshut met een centerline dubbelbed en aangrenzende natte cel. De gastenhut doet hier nauwelijks voor onder met een centerline dubbelbed voorin het schip. In het voorschip bevindt zich ook de derde hut met een stapelbed. De 9 Gebo romp ramen zorgen voor veel licht en ventilatie binnen. Ook voorzien van muggenhorren. 
In de pilothouse zorgen de getinte en 12 mm versterkte ramen voor een prachtig zicht rondom. 4 Ramen kunnen geopend worden. 
Naast de 1.300 ltr watertank is het schip ook voorzien van een gescheiden drinkwatertank (rvs) van 258 ltr met extra filters.
Tevens aanwezig:
Bosch was/droog combinatie. 
BBQ Magma rvs op hekstoel

Motor, electra, water
Voortstuwing: Maxprop
Zonnepaneel: 12x Solbian Flex 750W @ 24v
Watersysteem: Flojet 4.5 gpm
Warm water: Raritan 76 ltr
Watertank & materiaal: 2x tanks aluminium; 1300 ltr. 1x tank RVS; 258 ltr voor drinkwater
Watermaker: Sea Recovery SRC 600 (membranes require replacement)
Overig: 
De Caterpillar 3208 is nieuw geplaatst in 2000. De machinekamer is extra geisoleerd voor weinig motorgeluid. 
De aandrijving loopt via Aquadrive homokineet met stuwdruklager naar de Maxprop vaanstandschroef.
Acculaders:
Mastervolt 100 amp 24v DC service
Mastervolt 100 amp 24v DC service
10 amp DC start
2x mastervolt 24v:12v 
 
Accu's:
8 x 225Ah Mastervolt 8D AGM 225 AH service, 900Ah @  24v: Nieuw van 2022
2 x 108Ah Mastervolt service AGM @ 12v
2 x 110Ah Vetus start engine
1 x 110Ah Vetus start generator

Tuigage
Rondhouten, verstaging: Rondal twin spreader
Genua: German Dimension Polyant Pro-radial van 2020. + North Sails; 97,5 m2 (1997)
Genua reefsysteem: Hood 3250 Seafurl hydraulic
Fok: German Dimension Polyant Pro-radial van 2020. + North Sails; 75 m2 (1997)
Voorzeil rolsysteem : Hood 3250 Seafurl hydraulic 
Overig: 

Verstaging geheel vervangen in 2020. 
Nieuwe Genua mei 2020: Kemp Sails tri-radiaal ,Dimension Polyant Pro-radial met UV-band. 
Nieuwe Fok mei 2020: Kemp Sails tri-radiaal Dimension Polyant Pro-radial , met UV-band. 
Service van hydraulische rolreef inrichting voorzeilen, hydraulische achterstagspanner en hydraulische op-/neerhouder met vervanging van seals, in voorjaar 2020.

 
2x Lewmar AST 66 hydraulische genua lieren
1x Lewmar AST 58 hydraulische grootschoot lier
2x Lewmar 46 AST handmatige lieren op de mast. 
 
2 spinnaker bomen op de mast. 

Navigatie en electronica
Overig: 
In 2022 is het jacht voorzien van nieuwe navigatie-elektronika, waaronder:

NMEA 0183 bedrading vervangen voor nieuwe NMEA 2000 CanBus

Raymarine Axiom 12 inch Multfunction Display voor kaartplotter in stuurhuis
Raymarine RCR remote card reader & USB in stuurhuis
Tweede Raymarine Axiom 12 inch Multifunction Display als radar display in stuurhuis
Raymarine Cyclone Solid State 55 Watt Radar, met 3ft Open Array antenne
Raymarine Axiom  RV 9 inch Multifunction Display in kuip, voor kaartplotter-, radar-, of sonar-weergave
Elk multifunction display kan de kaartplotter, danwel radar weergeven, of desgwenst beide met split screen weergave. De nieuwe sonar transducer dient nog geinstalleerd te worden, bij de volgende helling. 


Uitrusting
Overig: 
Giek verlenger voor dingy lift. 
 
Muir hydraulische lier voor boeganker en landvasten. Boeganker: Delta 50 kg met 110m ketting. 
Lewmar Ocean lier voor hekanker en landvasten. Hekanker: CQR 50 kg met 30m ketting en 100 ankerlijn.

Reserve anker: 50 kg fisherman
 
Anker wash voor het afspoelen van het anker. 
 
Bimini + zonnetent
RVS loopplank/ zwemtrap

Veiligheid

Noodvuurwerk: RORC offshore flares pack
Gasbun met afvoer: 2 x 20 kg LPG aluminium tanks 
Overig: 
Bilge systemen:
- Rule 2000 gph met vlotter. Rule slaat aan bij water in de bilge.
- Jabsco 32750 gph aangesloten op de Caterpillar hoofdmotor.
- Whale Titan 36 gph handpomp,
- Hoofdsysteempomp systeem. Vanuit iedere bilge loopt een 50 mm afzuiging.

- Alde lek tester

name: 2019 Ice Yachts ICE 602019 Ice Yachts ICE 60
description:
"La linea degli ICE60 per loro natura semi custom, ha consentito una personalizzazione degli interni tale da stravolgere in parte il lay out del primo esemplare. Lo scafo interamente in carbonio accoglie al suo interno un ambiente molto aperto, lo sguardo appena scese le scalette corre libero dal salone centrale alla cabina armatoriale. Lo studio dell’ambiente rispetta delle precise simmetrie, infatti la disposizione dei divani è frontale e ogni divano ha un tavolino dedicato, trasformabile in tavolo da pranzo. Simmetrici anche i due mobili attrezzati della zona cucina e al centro un banco di lavoro ad isola che lascia un ottimo spazio di movimento per il passaggio dalla zona giorno alla zona notte armatoriale. Contribuisce all’idea di grande spazio aperto, la linea pulita degli elementi di arredo, che mantengono in ogni dettaglio un rigoroso ordine. L’arredo infatti minimalista esalta l’importanza degli elementi modellati in armonia ed integrazione con lo scafo, senza distrazioni da altri oggetti superflui. Ogni elemento di arredo è realizzato da stampi ed è caratterizzato da bordi tondeggianti che ammorbidiscono la loro linea decisa. Carbonio lasciato a vista sulle ante degli sportelli alti laterali, che corrono quasi senza interruzioni per tutto il fianco, a cui si unisce un’essenza chiara del legno per i mobili bassi e per i tavolini e un grigio antracite per i divani. Colori quindi neutri pronti a supportare il verde acido, un colore forte e di contrasto utilizzato in alcuni piani orizzontali in Corian e in alcuni fianchi scafo, verticali. Sullo sfondo a delimitare la zona armatoriale vi è una grande paratia in carbonio con un taglio futuristico esagonale ad evidenziare l’andamento dei rinforzi in fibra unidirezionale di carbonio che corrono lungo i bordi. La porta a filo, conduce alla spaziosa cabina con armadiature particolarmente capienti. I bagni sono tutti realizzati con piani e dettagli in carbonio a vista. Per oscurare le cabine che hanno tutte oblò con luce diretta, sono stati progettati dei pannelli scorrevoli rigidi. Il lay out della coperta, realizzata in carbonio, rispetta il rigore progettuale dell’intera imbarcazione. Tutta ricoperta di teak, albero e boma in carbonio e tuga con ampie vetrate a garantire una piacevole luminosità all’interno. Lo scafo è verde acido, una scelta grintosa, ripresa all’interno, che risulta perfettamente armonica con gli altri pochi colori neutri che si trovano anche in coperta." " ECCELLENTI CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. PER INFORMAZIONI : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069  INTERNI 3 Cabine, 3 Bagni Lo scafo interamente in carbonio accoglie al suo interno un ambiente molto aperto, lo sguardo appena scese le scalette corre libero dal salone centrale alla cabina armatoriale. Lo studio dell’ambiente rispetta delle precise simmetrie, infatti la disposizione dei divani è frontale e ogni divano ha un tavolino dedicato, trasformabile in tavolo da pranzo. Simmetrici anche i due mobili attrezzati della zona cucina e al centro un banco di lavoro ad isola che lascia un ottimo spazio di movimento per il passaggio dalla zona giorno alla zona notte armatoriale. Contribuisce all’idea di grande spazio aperto, la linea pulita degli elementi di arredo, che mantengono in ogni dettaglio un rigoroso ordine. Ogni elemento di arredo è realizzato da stampi ed è caratterizzato da bordi tondeggianti che ammorbidiscono la loro linea decisa. Carbonio lasciato a vista sulle ante degli sportelli alti laterali, che corrono quasi senza interruzioni per tutto il fianco, a cui si unisce un’essenza chiara del legno per i mobili bassi e per i tavolini e un grigio antracite per i divani. Colori quindi neutri pronti a supportare il verde acido, un colore forte e di contrasto utilizzato in alcuni piani orizzontali in Corian e in alcuni fianchi scafo, verticali. Sullo sfondo a delimitare la zona armatoriale vi è una grande paratia in carbonio con un taglio futuristico esagonale ad evidenziare l’andamento dei rinforzi in fibra unidirezionale di carbonio che corrono lungo i bordi. La porta a filo, conduce alla spaziosa cabina con armadiature particolarmente capienti. I bagni sono tutti realizzati con piani e dettagli in carbonio a vista. Per oscurare le cabine che hanno tutte oblò con luce diretta, sono stati progettati dei pannelli scorrevoli rigidi. Note sul prezzo: IVA Escl. sul res. leasing - ECCELLENTI CONDIZIONI GENERALI, + COMMISSIONI DI AGENZIA. PER INFORMAZIONI : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069
English "The line of ice60 by their nature semi-custom, has allowed a customization of the interior such as to partially distort the layout of the first specimen. The all-carbon hull accommodates a very open environment inside, the gaze as soon as the stairs descended runs free from the central saloon to the master cabin. The study of the environment respects precise symmetries, in fact the arrangement of the sofas is frontal and each sofa has a dedicated coffee table, which can be transformed into a dining table. Symmetrical also the two equipped furniture of the kitchen area and in the center an island workbench that leaves an excellent space for movement for the transition from the living area to the owner's sleeping area. It contributes to the idea of a large open space, the clean line of the furnishing elements, which maintain a rigorous order in every detail. In fact, the minimalist furniture enhances the importance of the elements modeled in harmony and integration with the hull, without distractions from other superfluous objects. Each piece of furniture is made from molds and is characterized by rounded edges that soften their decisive line. Carbon left exposed on the doors of the high side doors, which run almost without interruption throughout the side, which is joined by a light essence of wood for the low furniture and for the tables and an anthracite gray for the sofas. Neutral colors ready to support acid green, a strong and contrasting color used in some horizontal planes in Corian and in some hull sides, vertical. In the background to delimit the owner's area there is a large carbon bulkhead with a futuristic hexagonal cut to highlight the trend of the unidirectional carbon fiber reinforcements that run along the edges. The flush door leads to the spacious cabin with particularly large wardrobes. The bathrooms are all made with exposed carbon tops and details. To obscure the cabins that all have portholes with direct light, rigid sliding panels have been designed. The layout of the deck, made of carbon, respects the design rigor of the entire boat. All covered with teak, tree and carbon boom and deckhouse with large windows to ensure a pleasant brightness inside. The hull is acid green, a gritty choice, taken up inside, which is perfectly harmonious with the other few neutral colors that are also found on deck." " EXCELLENT GENERAL CONDITION, + AGENCY FEES. The study of the environment respects precise symmetries, in fact the arrangement of the sofas is frontal and each sofa has a dedicated coffee table, which can be transformed into a dining table. Symmetrical also the two equipped furniture of the kitchen area and in the center an island workbench that leaves an excellent space for movement for the transition from the living area to the owner's sleeping area. It contributes to the idea of a large open space, the clean line of the furnishing elements, which maintain a rigorous order in every detail. In fact, the minimalist furniture enhances the importance of the elements modeled in harmony and integration with the hull, without distractions from other superfluous objects. Each piece of furniture is made from molds and is characterized by rounded edges that soften their decisive line. Carbon left exposed on the doors of the high side doors, which run almost without interruption throughout the side, which is joined by a light essence of wood for the low furniture and for the tables and an anthracite gray for the sofas. In the background to delimit the owner's area there is a large carbon bulkhead with a futuristic hexagonal cut to highlight the trend of the unidirectional carbon fiber reinforcements that run along the edges. To obscure the cabins that all have portholes with direct light, rigid sliding panels have been designed. Française « La ligne de ice60 par leur nature semi-personnalisée, a permis une personnalisation de l’intérieur telle qu’elle déforme partiellement la disposition du premier spécimen. La coque tout en carbone s’adapte à un environnement très ouvert à l’intérieur, le regard dès la descente des escaliers se libère du salon central à la cabine principale. L’étude de l’environnement respecte des symétries précises, en effet la disposition des canapés est frontale et chaque canapé dispose d’une table basse dédiée, qui peut être transformée en table à manger. Symétrique aussi les deux meubles équipés de la cuisine et au centre un établi îlot qui laisse un excellent espace de mouvement pour la transition du salon à la zone de couchage du propriétaire. Il contribue à l’idée d’un grand espace ouvert, la ligne épurée des éléments d’ameublement, qui maintiennent un ordre rigoureux dans les moindres détails. En effet, le mobilier minimaliste renforce l’importance des éléments modélisés en harmonie et en intégration avec la coque, sans distractions d’autres objets superflus. Chaque meuble est fabriqué à partir de moules et se caractérise par des bords arrondis qui adoucissent leur ligne décisive. Carbone laissé exposé sur les portes des portes latérales hautes, qui courent presque sans interruption sur tout le côté, qui est rejoint par une essence légère de bois pour les meubles bas et pour les tables et un gris anthracite pour les canapés. Couleurs neutres prêtes à supporter le vert acide, une couleur forte et contrastée utilisée dans certains plans horizontaux en Corian et dans certains côtés de coque, verticaux. En arrière-plan pour délimiter la zone du propriétaire, il y a une grande cloison en carbone avec une coupe hexagonale futuriste pour mettre en évidence la tendance des renforts unidirectionnels en fibre de carbone qui longent les bords. La porte affleurante mène à la cabine spacieuse avec des armoires particulièrement grandes. Les salles de bains sont toutes faites avec des plateaux et des détails en carbone exposés. Pour masquer les cabines qui ont toutes des hublots à lumière directe, des panneaux coulissants rigides ont été conçus. La disposition du pont, en carbone, respecte la rigueur de conception de l’ensemble du bateau. Le tout recouvert de teck, d’arbre et de carbone boom et rouf avec de grandes fenêtres pour assurer une luminosité agréable à l’intérieur. La coque est vert acide, un choix graveleux, repris à l’intérieur, ce qui est parfaitement harmonieux avec les quelques autres couleurs neutres que l’on trouve également sur le pont. " EXCELLENT ÉTAT GÉNÉRAL, + FRAIS D’AGENCE. Deutsch "Die Linie von ice60 von Natur aus semi-custom, hat eine Anpassung des Innenraums ermöglicht, so dass das Layout des ersten Exemplars teilweise verzerrt wird. Der Vollcarbon-Rumpf bietet Platz für eine sehr offene Umgebung im Inneren, der Blick, sobald die Treppe absteigt, läuft vom zentralen Salon zur Masterkabine frei. Das Studium der Umgebung respektiert präzise Symmetrien, in der Tat ist die Anordnung der Sofas frontal und jedes Sofa hat einen speziellen Couchtisch, der in einen Esstisch umgewandelt werden kann. Symmetrisch auch die beiden ausgestatteten Möbel des Küchenbereichs und in der Mitte eine Inselwerkbank, die einen hervorragenden Bewegungsraum für den Übergang vom Wohnbereich zum Schlafbereich des Eigentümers lässt. Es trägt zur Idee eines großen offenen Raumes bei, der klaren Linie der Einrichtungselemente, die in jedem Detail eine strenge Ordnung aufrechterhalten. In der Tat erhöhen die minimalistischen Möbel die Bedeutung der Elemente, die in Harmonie und Integration mit dem Rumpf modelliert sind, ohne Ablenkungen von anderen überflüssigen Objekten. Jedes Möbelstück besteht aus Formen und zeichnet sich durch abgerundete Kanten aus, die ihre entscheidende Linie weicher machen. Carbon an den Türen der hohen Seitentüren, die fast unterbrechungsfrei durch die Seite verlaufen, zu denen sich eine leichte Essenz aus Holz für die niedrigen Möbel und für die Tische und ein anthrazitfarbenes Grau für die Sofas gesellt. Neutrale Farben, die bereit sind, saures Grün zu unterstützen, eine starke und kontrastierende Farbe, die in einigen horizontalen Ebenen in Corian und in einigen Rumpfseiten vertikal verwendet wird. Im Hintergrund, um den Bereich des Eigentümers abzugrenzen, befindet sich ein großes Carbon-Schott mit einem futuristischen sechseckigen Schnitt, um den Trend der unidirektionalen Kohlefaserverstärkungen hervorzuheben, die entlang der Kanten verlaufen. Die bündige Tür führt in die geräumige Kabine mit besonders großen Kleiderschränken. Die Badezimmer sind alle mit freiliegenden Carbonplatten und Details ausgestattet. Um die Kabinen zu verdecken, die alle Bullaugen mit direktem Licht haben, wurden starre Schiebepaneele entworfen. Das Layout des Decks aus Carbon respektiert die Designgenauigkeit des gesamten Bootes. Alle mit Teakholz, Baum und Carbon-Boom und Deckshaus mit großen Fenstern bedeckt, um eine angenehme Helligkeit im Inneren zu gewährleisten. Der Rumpf ist säuregrün, eine düstere Wahl, die innen aufgenommen wird und perfekt mit den anderen wenigen neutralen Farben harmoniert, die auch an Deck zu finden sind." " AUSGEZEICHNETER ALLGEMEINZUSTAND, + AGENTURGEBÜHREN. FÜR INFORMATIONEN : LUCA ABATE +39 340 86 12 069  INNENRÄUME 3 Kabinen, 3 Badezimmer Der Vollcarbon-Rumpf bietet Platz für eine sehr offene Umgebung im Inneren, der Blick, sobald die Treppe absteigt, läuft vom zentralen Salon zur Masterkabine frei. Español "La línea de ice60 por su naturaleza semi-personalizada, ha permitido una personalización del interior tal que distorsiona parcialmente el diseño del primer espécimen. El casco de carbono acomoda un ambiente muy abierto en el interior, la mirada tan pronto como las escaleras descienden corre libre desde el salón central hasta la cabina principal. El estudio del entorno respeta simetrías precisas, de hecho la disposición de los sofás es frontal y cada sofá tiene una mesa de centro dedicada, que se puede transformar en una mesa de comedor. Simétricos también los dos muebles equipados de la zona de cocina y en el centro un banco de trabajo de isla que deja un excelente espacio para el movimiento para la transición de la sala de estar a la zona de dormitorio del propietario. Contribuye a la idea de un gran espacio abierto, la línea limpia de los elementos de decoración, que mantienen un orden riguroso en cada detalle. De hecho, el mobiliario minimalista realza la importancia de los elementos modelados en armonía e integración con el casco, sin distracciones de otros objetos superfluos. Cada mueble está hecho de moldes y se caracteriza por bordes redondeados que suavizan su línea decisiva. Carbono dejado expuesto en las puertas de las puertas laterales altas, que recorren casi sin interrupción por todo el lateral, al que se une una ligera esencia de madera para los muebles bajos y para las mesas y un gris antracita para los sofás. Colores neutros listos para soportar el verde ácido, un color fuerte y contrastante utilizado en algunos planos horizontales en Corian y en algunos lados del casco, vertical. Al fondo para delimitar la zona del propietario hay un gran mamparo de carbono con un corte hexagonal futurista para resaltar la tendencia de los refuerzos unidireccionales de fibra de carbono que recorren los bordes. La puerta enrasada conduce a la espaciosa cabina con armarios particularmente grandes. Todos los baños están hechos con tapas y detalles de carbono expuesto. Para oscurecer las cabinas que tienen ojos de buey con luz directa, se han diseñado paneles deslizantes rígidos. El diseño de la cubierta, hecho de carbono, respeta el rigor de diseño de todo el barco. Todo cubierto con teca, árbol y pluma de carbono y deckhouse con grandes ventanales para garantizar una agradable luminosidad en el interior. El casco es de color verde ácido, una opción arenosa, tomada en el interior, que es perfectamente armoniosa con los otros pocos colores neutros que también se encuentran en la cubierta". " EXCELENTE ESTADO GENERAL, + HONORARIOS DE AGENCIA. name: 1979 Herreshoff Bounty1979 Herreshoff Bounty
description:
Tamasha is one of 8 or 9 Herreshoff Bounty’s that were built by Alan Orams Sea Glass Marine in New Zealand. This classic design represents the brilliance and superior skill of Francis Herreshoff – a name synonymous with classic yacht design, building, and innovation. What makes her different from other Bounty’s is her interior and the fact that she has a centre cockpit and a hard dodger. This vessel requires significant updating to bring her back to her former glory including new rigging, stantions, teak deck replacement, exterior painting, anti-fouling and mechanical overhauls. The price has been significantly reduced to US$45,000 and is sold on an "as is, where is" basis. A rare opportunity to purchase a classic pedigree at a very attractive price.
Viewing by appointment at our Grenada Office 473 422 6418 info(at)clarkeandcartercaribbean.comMehr anzeigen

name: 2008 Fairline Squadron 582008 Fairline Squadron 58
description: The NU is an absolute unique 2008 Fairline Squadron 58. She has been pure luxury since her redesign and refit worth around €200,000*. Since this comprehensive refit in 2020 under the aegis of the Icelandic interior designer Magnea Haralds, she has distinguished herself from all others on the market: The interior design thrives on a professional color concept and is more reminiscent of the interior of ultra-modern superyachts than of classic motor yachts. Those who love traditional, highly polished mahogany surfaces are in the wrong place here, but if your heart beats for lavish modern extravagance, then you are spot on with the NU. Not only design freaks get their money's worth with this super yacht in miniature, but also music lovers who like to let it rip on the high seas. The previous owner of the yacht J. Lanz, ex-band member of ABBA, has turned the yacht into half a concert hall in terms of sound technology, mind you not only the saloon, but also the owner's cabin, aft deck and above all the flybridge. The surfaces in the dinette, saloon, galley, cabins including toilets and washrooms shine in an extremely high-quality bronze/gold tone in combination with matt anthracite. This look is paired with the Black and White theme: The seats were all covered with white artificial leather (easy-care); This white contrasts with the matt anthracite of the dining table and living room table as well as the floors, which are also anthracite. In keeping with this, the vertical blinds of all portholes were replaced by anthracite-colored ones. The double deck layout offers full standing headroom throughout. The lower helm, has instrument panel veneered in anthracite. The electrically adjustable pilot & co-pilot seats are located starboard forward of the fully equipped galley. Just to starboard of the helm is an aircraft style side exit door. This ample sized vessel boasts three staterooms, two with twins and one double. The Master occupies the entire forward section of the boat and features a queen size bed and head and shower facilities en-suite.  The Aft cockpit has a large alfresco seating group that is shaded by the flybridge overhang. The transom leads to the vast bathing platform via the port or starboard side gates. The Black & White theme is also continued on the Fly Bridge in the sense of a consistently implemented color concept: the upholstery of the 3 front seats at the helm station and the upholstery of the bench seat around the large table have been reupholstered in white, with both biminis the blue one cloth replaced with a black one. And outside, the topic does not end with the now black fenders with white NU lettering on them. The large oval flybridge with asymmetrical design makes it a wonderful surrounding for socializing. As you curve around the front of the helm, positioned in the center, you will notice the large, upholstered semicircular sunbed. Behind the helm is a large settee with seats upholstered in white. There is a bar, with sink, ice maker, refrigerator and electric griddle and twin bimini tops refitted in black which contrasts perfectly with the white of the seats. This Fairline Squadron 58 is fully equipped for cruising, comfort and relaxation in an atmosphere of the most modern exclusivity As with all Fairline models, hand-laid GRP hull is a modified deep-V designed by Bernard Olesinski with a sharp entry that moderates to 18 degrees of deadrise and continues past the transom to 'build in' the swim platform. Combined with multiple full-length lift straps, this shape can cut through the water high and dry and with minimal jerking at speeds in excess of 30 mph. With the Teleflex power steering and the electronic single lever control from Mathers, the handling of the boat is sporty and safe. Example: During a 180-degree turn into the weather at a speed of 40 km / h, she was hardly disturbed by quarter and lateral seas. name: 1955 Abeking & Rasmussen 12 KR-Yawl1955 Abeking & Rasmussen 12 KR-Yawl
description: 12 KR-Yawl gebaut für Hochsee-Regatta-Zwecke auf der Nordsee und dem Atlantik (u. a. auch Boston Tea Cup Regatta)Werft: Abeking und Rasmussen / Bremen, Lemwerder,Baujahr 1955 / Baunummer 5004, Segelnummer 12 KR II, Konstrukteur: Jimmy Rasmussen Rumpf / Massiv-Mahagoni auf Eichenspanten / Deck Teakholz-Massiv (Original)Rigg aus Aluminium von Reckmann / Rollgenua, Segel aus Hydranet II von BeilkenMotor: Typ OM 617, Mercedes Diesel 5 Zylinder / 83 PS / überholt März 2016 Nach über 30 Jahren auf vielen Reisen (pro Jahr ca. 12 Wochen), Nordkap, Schottland, Ostsee, Biskaya, Kanarische Inseln, westliches Mittelmeer, soll es genug sein.Die Yacht ist zu einem fairen Preis abzugeben in Hände, die sie weiterhin hegen, pflegen und bewahren.Dieses einzigartige Schiff ist es Wert! Segelfertig, in sehr gutem Zustand, technisch gut ausgerüstet, mit einem guten Reckmann-Rigg und einer neuwertigen Besegelung in Hydra Net II von Beilken.Das Winterlager und die fachmännische Unterhaltung mit nachvollziehbaren Reparaturen erfolgten seit drei Jahrzehnten auf auf einer bekannten Bremer Yachtwerft.Mehr anzeigen

description: CAP MED BOAT & YACHT Consulting a le plaisir de vous présenter le Custom Yacht d'exception "PHENIX DIXI"."PHENIX DIXI" est un élégant voilier sloop de 65’ sur plan Ribadeau Dumas …Un subtil équilibre de confort et de performance, dans la plus authentique tradition maritime.Construit en 1992, il a fait l’objet en 2004 d’un refit technique complet, visant à agrémenter sa performante carène d’un aménagement soigné, digne des plus confortables voiliers de plaisance modernes.Rigoureusement entretenue, cette unité est dotée de tous les équipements de service modernes, et même d’avantage (climatisations, générateur, déssalinisateur, manoeuvres hydrauliques, voiles Hydranet …). Son matériel électronique de tout premier choix a été totalement renouvelé en 2019.Un voilier d’exception …ACCASTILLAGE=======================Rail d'écoute de grand voile Winch électrique 6 winches électriques HARKEN - Tangon de spi Gréement de spi Bout dehors Carbone - Barre à roue Gréement MARECHAL Alu, 4 étages de barres de flèches. - Gréement dormant en Rod.Enrouleur de génois sous pont. - Etai de trinquette textile. - Pied de mât sur vérin amovible (type Master jack). - Halebas hydraulique - Pataras Hydraulique. - Bordure HydrauliqueEQUIPEMENTS=======================Propulseur d'étrave Rétractable - Ancre CQR 25 Kg sur ligne chaine de 60 mètres (12mm) - Guindeau électrique MUIR - Armement Hauturier - Survie 2 radeaux 8 places - Peinture de coque Polish 2020 - Antifouling 2020 - Bateau entrèrement refité en 2004. - Construction bois en forme / epoxy avec renforts structurels carbone. - Peinture de coque polyuréthane bleue en très bel état (polish 2020). - Soute de jupe indépendante dédiée à l'annexe. - Pont et cockpit teck, hiloires et montants de roof en bois vernis (entretien 2020). - Voile de quille en inox avec bulbe plomb. - Appareil de gouverne Bi safrans en materiaux composite. - Propulsion ligne d'arbre directe sur transmission aquadrive Vulcain.COMMUNICATION=======================VHF B/G H90 avec combiné sans fil - Radar Radome B/G - Materiel électronique intégralement remplacé en 2019.Centrale de Navigation B/G totalement interfacée. - Calculateur HERCULE B/G.2 écrans multifonction 18'' au poste de barre. - 1 écran répétiteur 12'' à la table à carte. - Centrale WIFI 4G. - Nombreux répétiteurs TRITON multifonction (barre et table à carte). - Transpondeur AIS SIMRAD. - Téléphone IRIDIUM. - Telephone GSM.CONFORT=======================Table à cartes - Climatisation 3 groupes - clim indépendants - Chauffe eau - Dessalinisateur Dessalator 280 L/h - WC marin - WC électrique - Eau douce - Aménagements réalisés en 2004. - Très belle finition en ébenisterie claire sycomore et érable. - Ensemble de vaigrages alcantara. - Parquets vernis en plaquage chêne millénaire. - Magnifiques tables de carré avec marquetterie jeux de dames. - Installation Hifi et TV. - Vaste table à carte intégrant le matériel électronique de navigation (écrans multifonction). - Cuisine aménagée. - Ice maker et grand réfrigérateur. - Coffre fort. - Réseau d'eau douce sur groupe Hydrophore. - Divers chauffe eau sur 220 V et échangeur thermique.Hublots avec capteurs d'ouverture.CUISINE=======================Réfrigérateur 200 L - Groupe électrogène FISHER PANDA 12 Kw (220 / 380V) - Batteries de service Parc 1200 Ah / 24 V - Batteries moteur 100 Ah - Convertisseur 3 convertisseurs (24 / 220 V) - Totale autonomie en energie. - Parc de batteries dédié au propulseur d'étrave. - Batterie dédiée au générateur.Réseau de prises 220V sur convertisseurs. - Eclairages interieurs LED. - Gestionnaire de batterie MASTERVOLT. - Redresseur de tension 220V.NAVIGATION=======================Loch-speedomètre B/G écran multifonction TRITON - name: 2015 Robertson & Caine Leopard 582015 Robertson & Caine Leopard 58
description:
Flagge: USA, Antrieb: V-Antrieb, Wassertank: 1560 ltr, Fäkalientank: 255 ltr, Steuerung: Steuerrad 
Ausstattung Backofen (Smeg), Mikrowelle (General Electric), Gefrierschrank (Vitrifrigo 12v fridge and ice maker in flybridge wetbar), Klimaanlage (Webasto chilled water Air conditioning system, Total 72,000 BTU - 7 x controllers), Geschirrspülmaschine (Fisher und Paymel), Grill, Entsalzunganlage (Sea Recovery Aquamatic), Kompass (Plastimo Horizon 135), Echolot (Raymarine i70 tri-data), Windmessanlage (Raymarine i70 und windex), Autopilot (Raymarine p70s), UKW-Funk (Raymarine Ray 218 with remote at helm), Kartenplotter (Raymarine C Series 12inch hybridtouch), Log (GPS Speed), WC elektrisch ((6) Jabsco Electric flush - 4 plus crew head starboard bow), Lazy Jacks, Lazy bag (Ullman), Batterieladegerät (Centaur 60 Amp), Generator (Northern Lights 20 kw Genset), Inverter (12/5000/200 inverter/charger), Landanschluss 220V (1 x 50ft 50amp shorepower cable, AC outlets in cabins, galley, saloon und panel), Radio (Fusion MS UD 755 und Bose Sound System), Lautsprecher im Cockpit, Bimini-Top (Hard top), Warmwasseranlage (2 x Hot water tanks with total capacity 22USgal / 84L), Davits (Custom hydraulic dinghy swim platform), Teakdeck (Flexi Teak), Cockpittisch (Teak table and chairs for aft cockpit dining for ten (10) guests), Badeleiter, Kühlschrank (Vitrifrigo DW360BT front-opening fridge / 2-drawer freezer; Fridge - 157L / 5.55cuft; Freezer - 144L / 5cuft), Bilgenpumpe man. ((2) Main bilges), Bilgenpumpe elektr. (4 with float switches and alarms), Rollgenua (Ullman), Polsterbezüge, Deckdusche (Hot/Cold water), Großsegel - Lattengroß (Ullman, with Antal System) 
2015 ROBERTSON AND CAINE LEOPARD 58 – Ocean Suite 
BUILDERS REMARKS: Nothing compares to cruising the sea aboard the Leopard 58, exclusively designed and built for The Moorings by Robertson and Caine. With a spacious, split-level floor plan featuring two cabins opening to a forward cockpit and four cabins below (all with private en-suite baths), the 5800 provides unforgettable sailing getaways for large groups. Venture up to the enormous fly bridge and captain from the helm station with a 360-degree vantage point, all sail control lines within arm's reach, electric winches and a fully equipped Raymarine Navigation System. Performance under sail is nothing short of impeccable and made all the more pleasurable by fly bridge amenities including stylish lounge seating with an additional propane grill and wet bar/refrigerator. Down below, you'll find spacious, teak-style decking, state-of-the-art equipment and air-conditioning, making this yacht an unrivalled leader in cruising comfort. Inside the 5800, you'll discover a well-appointed galley with a large refrigerator, 2-drawer freezer, 4-burner gas cooker with oven und broiler, and microwave, offering the tools necessary for dining afloat. Meals can be enjoyed in the saloon, which includes plush wrap-around seating and a wet bar. The yacht also comes complete with 46” flat screen TV/DVD player, onboard WiFi, Apple TV, CD stereo with MP3 connection, as well as cockpit and fly bridge speakers. 
BROKERS REMARKS: OCEAN SUITE is a young model 6 cabin version with the lighter Ash interior Leopard 58. Total comfort for 10 guests and crew. The flybridge is a standout feature for hanging out and entertaining with wet bar and grill. 
 AVAILABILITY: Due to be released from the fleet on 31st July 2020. Please enquire for details. 
NOTE: This vessel sustained some damage from Hurricane IRMA, and has been repaired following the builders guidelines. The pictures of the vessel were taken after the repairs were completed. Please contact your Broker for more detailed information on the repairs. 
Additional Specs CONSTRUCTION HULL CONSTRUCTION: Composite Glass Reinforced Plastic (GRP) Sandwich with Balsa core DECK MATERIAL: Textured GRP RUDDER TYPE: Balanced spade rudder KEEL TYPE: Multihull WHERE BUILT: South Africa ENGINES AND CONTROLS ENGINE 1 HOURS RUN/DATE: 2400 estimated - May 2020 ENGINE 2 HOURS RUN/DATE: 2400 estimated - May 2020 GEARBOX: Yanmar KMH50V - ZF V-Drive CONTROLS: Teleflex Morse COOLING SYSTEM: Heat Exchanger SAILS AND RIGGING TYPE: Sloop Rig SPAR MAKER/MATERIAL: Sparcraft / Aluminium STANDING RIGGING MATERIAL: Stainless steel wire, original RUNNING RIGGING MATERIAL: Core braided line MAINSAIL REEFING: Slab reefing HEADSAIL ROLLER FURLING: Profurl Titanium WINCHES GENOA WINCHES: Lewmar 2 x 65AST, 2-speed, self-tailing MAIN HALYARD WINCH: Lewmar 1 x 65AEST (alloy) electric INSIDE EQUIPMENT COOKER TYPE: Smeg (5) Burner hob w separate oven GRILL: Yes at Flybridge wetbar SINK: (1) Double basin in galley and dish drainer SHOWERS: 7 plus transom shower HANDBASINS: 7 plus flybridge UPHOLSTERY/COLOUR SCHEME: Cream naugahyde in saloon and striped cotton covers in cabins INTERIOR CONSTRUCTION/WOOD TYPE: Cherry laminated marine ply ELECTRICAL EQUIPMENT VOLTAGE: 12V ELECTRICAL CIRCUIT: 110V HOUSE BATTERIES: 4 x AGM 210Ah house batteries ENGINE BATTERIES: 2 x AGM 100Ah engine starter batteries GENERATOR BATTERIES: 1 x AGM 100Ah GENERATOR: Northern Lights 20 kw Genset - 15389 hrs - 19th May 2020 DECK EQUIPMENT WARPS: 6 FENDERS: 8 PRIMARY ANCHOR: Delta SECONDARY ANCHOR: Danforth

With a spacious, split-level floor plan featuring two cabins opening to a forward cockpit and four cabins below (all with private en-suite baths), the 5800 provides unforgettable sailing getaways for large groups. * 100% refurbished in her recent refit. 
BUILDERS REMARKS: Nothing compares to cruising the sea aboard the Leopard 58, exclusively designed and built for The Moorings by Robertson and Caine. With a spacious, split-level floor plan featuring two cabins opening to a forward cockpit and four cabins below (all with private en-suite baths), the 5800 provides unforgettable sailing getaways for large groups. Venture up to the enormous fly bridge and captain from the helm station with a 360-degree vantage point, all sail control lines within arm's reach, electric winches and a fully equipped Raymarine Navigation System. Performance under sail is nothing short of impeccable and made all the more pleasurable by fly bridge amenities including stylish lounge seating with an additional propane grill and wet bar/refrigerator. Down below, you'll find spacious, teak-style decking, state-of-the-art equipment and air-conditioning, making this yacht an unrivalled leader in cruising comfort. Inside the 5800, you'll discover a well-appointed galley with a large refrigerator, 2-drawer freezer, 4-burner gas cooker with oven und broiler, and microwave, offering the tools necessary for dining afloat. Meals can be enjoyed in the saloon, which includes plush wrap-around seating and a wet bar. The yacht also comes complete with 46” flat screen TV/DVD player, onboard WiFi, Apple TV, CD stereo with MP3 connection, as well as cockpit and fly bridge speakers. 
BROKERS REMARKS: DALLIANCE is the only crewed ex-charter Leopard 58 available on the market. There is a reason that existing owners have not wanted to sell, as there is simply nothing else on the market that gives Super-Yacht feeling at this price point. Dalliance has always been the jewel of our fleet, and has been crewed by a professional team since day one. The quality and calibre of this yacht reflects this, we welcome a viewing, and can introduce you to her loyal crew. The Moorings Yacht brokerage is very excited to have this listing, and we expect big interest on this magnificent six cabin catamaran. 
 AVAILABILITY: Due to be released from the fleet on 30th June 2020. Please enquire for details. 
NOTE: This vessel sustained some damage from Hurricane IRMA, and has been repaired following the builders guidelines. The pictures of the vessel were taken after the repairs were completed. Please contact your Broker for more detailed information on the repairs.

description: Awesome Marc Lombard IMOCA 60-inspired offshore speed machine in full carbon with centreboard, water ballast, easily managed rig-plan.The flagship of the Black Pepper fleet, the Code 2 is the result of a design collaboration between Marc Lombard and Armel Tripon (winner of Route de Rhum 2018, and IMOCA 60 racer) to design an IMOCA 60 inspired offshore speed machine equally at home racing as she is to very fast cruising. Constructedin full carbon fibre with Axxon carbon rig, twin rudders, centreboard and water ballast, she is perfectly configured for racing and cruising duties on both sides of the Atlantic.Recently built by the Shipyard, she will be going into the water early September 2019, and from then visible in Mediterranean.She represents a very rare opportunity to acquire what would almost certainly be an ultimate line of honors boat, as well as fitting very neatly in the middle of the Mini Maxi class. With measurements for ORC, IRC, PHRF and CSA racing, as well as custom polar from Sailing Performance she is also race-ready for most of races including Offshores and Inshore.Mehr anzeigen

XBOAT ref 5242.AVENTURIN 54 Le dériveur intégral bi-safrans au poids et aux performances d'un quillard.Construction composite, strip planking (gain de poids et raideur pour les fonds, dérive lourde, bustleet ballast d'eau douce (raideur Ã la toile).Les mots du propriétaire / constructeur :"Aventurin est un dériveur intégral de 16.40 m de long (17.30 ht) et de 4.73 de large construit encomposite verre époxy kevlar carbone. Son tirant d'eau dérive haute est de 3.20 m et de 1.20 mdérive basse.Le mât carbone (Formula mast) ,posé sur les fonds est de 22.2 m au-dessus du pont. La bôme estégalement en carbone.Nous disposons à bord de trois cabines, une très grande à l'avant (couchage de 2.35x2.85 m x 2.0 m )et deux grandes cabines arrières ( couchage 1.65 x 1.25 m x2.0 m) et d'une soute avant pouvant êtreutilisée en cabine pour un marin .Carré et salon sont revêtus de cuir bordeaux le bois de placagemassif ( 3 mm )est collé sur des façades, planchers en composite ou directement sur la coque encompositeLa cuisine est équipée d'un réfrigérateur, d'un congélateur, d'un four à gaz,d'une hotte aspirante ,d'un four micro-onde et d'un évier inoxydable de grande capacité. Une machine à laver le linge (3kg)est installée sous l'évier de la cuisine . Un système d'aspiration automatique des poussières sous lesplanchers facilite le nettoyage. Un dessalator de 200 l/h alimente deux réservoirs de 850 litres quipeuvent être ballastés. Le moteur principal est de 83 ch , la réserve en carburant est de 600 l pouvantêtre portée Ã 900 l."Ce luxueux dériveur intégral est une superbe réalisation véritable concentré d'expériences nautiqueet de technologie.Valeur expertisée lors de sa mise à l'eau en 2014 900 000 euroPossibilité de convoyage sur votre bassin de navigation. name: 2006 Beneteau 572006 Beneteau 57
description:
Beneteau 57 in perfect condition, located in Almería, Spain


Perfectly maintained Beneteau 57 of 2006, located in Almería, Spain. One careful owner. This outstanding cruiser still looks new in- and outside. Never chartered or used for long-distance ocean cruising. Yanmar engine in perfect condition with less then 2.000 engine hours. Hull was painted new with certified DuPont system in 2021, preventive anti-osmosis treatment was done in 2022. Teak deck and standing rigging in good condition. The Beneteau 57 was designed by Bruce Farr and built by Beneteau France according highest quality standards, not to be compared with the common Beneteau range. Lots of extras: powerful watermaker, generator, airco hot/cold (5 units), freezer, etc etc. All taxes paid in Spain. Interested or want to make an appointment for a visit? Contact Frans Bennekers from White Whale Spain Yacht Brokers on spain@wwy.nl or call +34 629979667.
(ES) Beneteau 57 del 2006 en excelente estado, localizado en Almería, España. Un propietario, muy cuidadoso. El barco parece todavía nuevo tanto por dentro como por fuera. Nunca utilizado para charter o travesías largas. Motor Yanmar en perfecto estado con apenas 2.000 horas. El casco se pintó nuevo en 2021 con el sistema certificado de DuPont, y se aplicó tratamiento preventivo anti-osmosis en el 2022. Cubierta de teca y jarcia en buen estado. Diseñado por Bruce Farr y construido por Beneteau con un acabado exquisito, no comparable con otros barcos de serie de Beneteau. Muchos extras: potente potabilizadora, generador, aire acondicionado caliente/frio (5 uds), congelador etc etc. Todos los impuestos pagados en España. Interesado en una visita? name: 2004 Beneteau 572004 Beneteau 57
description:
ENGLISH   This Beneteau 57 designed by Bruce Farr is in great condition throughout and is undoubtedly one of the nicest on the market right now. This year, her decks have been laid with new 12mm Burma teak. And this year as well, her hull has been re-spray-painted in Awlgrip in a distinguished colour blue. On top of that, the standing and the running rigging has been replaced in the year 2019.  She is cutter rigged with an in-mast furling main sail, furling genoa, furling stay sail, furling Code 0, a storm jib, and a spinnaker. Furthermore, equipped with; a 160hp diesel engine, bow thruster, generator, inverter, battery chargers, and a complete and partly renewed Raymarine navigation package including radar, AIS and Sat phone. Further to that, a water maker, a new life raft, electric stainless steel davits, a deluxe cockpit table with inbuilt fridge, numerous covers, etc. Going down, you’ll instantly notice that the interior is beyond elegant. From the stylish woodwork, to the fancy lighting, to the materials used. There is an overall sense of spaciousness and comfort. She has two double cabins forward, each with an en suite toilet but sharing a shower. There is a third guest cabin with own head compartment amidships on starboard side. The passage way aft connects the saloon to the huge master cabin with island bed and ample ensuite bathroom. To port aft you´ll find the semi-open fully equipped galley. Of course she is fitted out with everything you need to travel in great comfort, like; reversible air conditioning throughout, TV’s, dishwasher and a washing machine. This Beneteau ticks all the boxes.
DEUTSCH  Diese Beneteau 57, entworfen von Bruce Farr, befindet sich in einem hervorragenden Zustand und ist zweifellos eine der schönsten, die momentan auf dem Markt sind. Dieses Jahr wurden die Decks mit neuem 12mm Burma Teak verlegt. Dazu wurde auch noch in diesem Jahr der Rumpf mit Awlgrip in einem distinguierten Blau neu spritzlackiert. Darüber hinaus wurden im Jahr 2019 das stehende und das laufende Gut erneuert.  Sie ist kuttergetakelt mit einem Rollgroßsegel, Rollgenua, Rollstagsegel, Code 0, Sturmfock und einem Spinnaker. Weiter, ausgestattet mit einem 160 PS Dieselmotor, Bugstrahlruder, Generator, Wechselrichter, Batterieladegeräten und einem kompletten und teilweise erneuerten Raymarine-Navigationspaket mit Radar, AIS und Satellitentelefon. Außerdem gibt es einen Wassermacher, eine neue Rettungsinsel, elektrische Edelstahldavits, einen luxuriösen Cockpittisch mit eingebautem Kühlschrank, zahlreiche Abdeckungen, usw. Das Interieur dieser Beneteau 57 ist geschmackvoll, geräumig und komfortabel. Sie verfügt insgesamt über 4 Kabinen. Im Vorschiff sind zwei Doppelbett-Gäste-kabinen mit eigener Toilette. Diese zwei Kabinen teilen eine gemeinsame Duschkabine. Eine dritte Gästekabine mit eigener Toilette befindet sich mittschiffs auf der Steuerbordseite. Der Durchgang achtern verbindet den Salon mit der riesigen Eignerkabine mit Inselbett und eigenem Bad. An Backbord achtern befindet sich die halboffene, voll ausgestattete Kombüse. Natürlich ist sie mit allem ausgestattet, was Sie für eine komfortable Reise benötigen, wie z.B. eine Klimaanlage, Fernseher, Geschirrspüler und Waschmaschine. Diese Beneteau erfüllt (fast) alle Kriterien.
NEDERLANDS -    Deze Beneteau 57, ontworpen door Bruce Farr, verkeert in zeer goede staat en is ongetwijfeld één van de mooiste op de markt op dit moment. Dit jaar zijn de dekken voorzien van nieuw 12mm Birma teak. Tevens is dit jaar de romp opnieuw gespoten in Awlgrip in een gedistingeerde kleur blauw. Bovendien is in 2019 het staand én het lopend want vervangen. Ze is kotter-getuigd met een in-mast rolgrootzeil, rolgenua, rolstagzeil, Code 0, stormfok, en een spinnaker. Verder uitgerust met; een 160pk dieselmotor, boegschroef, generator, omvormer, acculaders, en een compleet en deels vernieuwt Raymarine navigatiepakket inclusief radar, AIS en satelliet telefoon.Verder een watermaker, een nieuw reddingsvlot, elektrische RVS davits, een luxe kuiptafel met ingebouwde koelkast, talloze covers, etc. Het interieur van deze Beneteau 57 is elegant, ruim en comfortabel. Ze heeft twee gastenhutten voorin, elk met een eigen toilet, maar met een gedeelde douche. Er is een derde gastenhut met eigen toiletruimte midscheeps aan stuurboordzijde. De doorgang naar achteren verbindt de salon met de grote eigenaarshut met ruime badkamer ensuite. Aan bakboord vindt u de halfopen kombuis. Natuurlijk is ze uitgerust met alles wat u nodig heeft om in alle comfort te reizen, zoals; airconditioning, Tv’s, vaatwasser en een wasmachine. Deze Beneteau heeft het allemaal.
ESPAÑOL -     Este Beneteau 57 diseñado por Bruce Farr está en gran condición y es sin duda uno de los más bonitos en el mercado en este momento. Este año, las cubiertas de teca han sido renovadas con nueva teca de Birmania de 12mm. Y, también este año se han repintado el casco con Awlgrip en un distinguido color azul. Además, la jarcia firme y la jarcia de labor han sido reemplazadas en el año 2019. Mehr anzeigen

name: 2022 Dufour 562022 Dufour 56
description:
DUFOUR 56 NEUF.
SEAWAYS YACHTING - DISTRIBUTEUR DUFOUR YACHTS POUR LES ALPES MARITIMES.
LIVRAISON A GOLFE JUAN, POSSIBILITÉS DE FINANCEMENT EN LEASING, DE PLACE DE PORT AVEC OU SANS GESTION LOCATION.
PACK CONFORT
3 cabines / 3 salles d'eau équipées de holding tanks, WC électrique Cabine Avant, Moteur 110CV, Ligne d'arbre Hélice 4 pales mise en drapeau, Ambiance Boston (Teck - Corian Ash Concrete - plancher Wengé - Rabbani gris), GV full batten + Lazy bag Dark Smoke, Foc auto-vireur, Hale-bas rigide, Guindeau 1600W, Table de cockpit, Bain de soleil intégré dans assise cockpit tribord, Douchette de pont eau chaude/froide, Portes de filières, Barre à roue gainée cuir, 2 winchs German system T552, Winchs de roof T50, Bancs de cockpit et assises arrière en teck naturel, 4 hublots de cockpit, Circuit 220V, Batterie supplémentaire 1x140Ah, Chargeur de batterie 60Ah, Eclairage LED, Séparation de douche plexis, caillebotis, Pompe de douche automatique, Stores et rideaux, Support moteur HB, Réfrigérateur et  conservateur, Four à micro-onde 220V, Pompe à pied eau de mer, Holding tank avant tribord et arrière bâbord, Table de carré avec pied électrique, Pompe de cale électrique, Radio CD avec enceinte HP extérieur, Eclairage dans pavois.
PACK PREMIUM
Pods support instruments console de barre tribord et bâbord, Capote de Descente avec main courante Dark Smoke, Propulseur d'étrave rétractable, Teck sur fond de cockpit, Plage arrière, Ouverture électrique porte arrière avec télécommande, Frigo Inox intégré à la table de cockpit, Plancha à gaz extérieur, Winch de roof électrique T50 bâbord, Rail de génois, écoute et réglage de chariot.
PACK ELECTRONIQUE SAILING + CRUISING
Centrale loch speedo girouette anémomètre + 1 afficheur I70 à bâbord, Pilote automatique Evolution Raymarine - Moteur Lewmar rotatif - afficheur P70, VHF Ray63  + second combiné Ray Mic au poste de barre tribord, GPS AXIOM 12 PRO à tribord, GPS AXIOM 12 PRO à bâbord, AIS 700 émetteur récepteur, HP VHF de cockpit.
OPTIONS
Protection d'étrave Inox, Mouillage principal, 3 aussières, 6 défenses, Coussins extérieurs Dark smoke, Housses de barres à roue + housse de table de cockpit, Bimini Dark Smoke, Rinçage puit à chaine, Convertisseur 12V/220V 2000W.
Sans cesse tourné vers l’avenir, Dufour conçoit chaque nouveau modèle pour vous donner du plaisir et des sensations en toute sérénité, quels que soient vos projets de croisière et d’utilisation de votre voilier. Depuis plus de 60 ans, nous concevons et construisons des voiliers innovants et performants.

name: 2017 Dufour 56 Exclusive2017 Dufour 56 Exclusive
description:
Una barca a vela eccezionale, al top dell’innovazione Questo yacht di 17 metri associa con brio progettazione raffinata ed innovazioni spettacolari. Incarna tutta l'audacia di un progetto all’avanguardia, che ha saputo conservare la potenza di uno yacht in una barca a vela destinata a procurare le sensazioni più intense in mare. La Dufour 56 Exclusive vanta uno scafo molto equilibrato, con una sezione a poppa potente, una superficie immersa ridotta e sottili appendici alle uscite d'acqua. Il suo elevato rapporto di zavorra e la stabilità dello scafo permettono alla barca a vela di supportare un'attrezzatura potente, senza per questo sacrificare il comfort e la sicurezza a bordo. Il piano velico è stato sviluppato per garantire la massima performance con il minimo sforzo.
Disponibile con programma di gestione fino al 31/12/2023Mehr anzeigen

name: 2016 Hanse 5752016 Hanse 575
description: Hanse 575, years 2016 In the spring 2021 was made a complete restyling was with the transformation of the class from 2 to 1 without limits, below are the interventions made and the optional list: 1. registration class 1 no limit from the coast, installation of new instrumentation for class change (AIS, SART, EPIRB, NAVTEX + VHF) in addition to the raft and rockets, (over € 40,000 invested only for class change equipment) 2. Panda 6kw generator + 3-zone air conditioning + Inverter 3. Water maker 70L / h 4. Double basket dishwasher, ice maker, wine cellar, 55 inch TV with playstation, Nespresso coffee machine. 5. Fans in all cabins and dinette, new lights with built-in USB charge 6. 4 Under Water Light 7. Besenzoni electric gangway 250cm 8. New dark gray external cushions + sun bed + new carbon rudders 9. New full teak forward, deck and side aisles 10. New Anchor + 100 meters chain + remote control still wifi 11. 3 electric toilets 12. New mainsail and jib still to be installed 13. Double external B&G plotter + Autopilot + Radar + Ais 1 + Ais 2 14. Retractable bow thruster 15. Dinghy garage with electric winch for lifting the dinghy + air compressor (there is a Wiliams 285 turbojet 110hp from 2020 which would eventually be sold separately) 16. Electric platform at the stern with rail for climbing the Wiliams Turbojet 17. 2 Lewmar electric winches + 2 Lewmar manual winches 18. 2 Tables with electric leg in cockpit convertible into sunbed All the options listed above were purchased and installed new in 2021. The layout of the boat is 2 bow cabin + 2 toilets with electric toilet, 2 aft cabins + 1 toilet with electric toilet, fifth cabin to port with bunk beds. Bow crew cabin with toilet. Rolled mainsail plus jib. The owner was using the yacht 3/4 weeks a year + 3/4 weeks the yacht was in charter always with crew (skipper + Hostess), so no damage because the boat was always sails from the same skipper. The boat is sold by a Croatian company with unpaid VAT on display as it is registered as a charter boat. The boat will be available from October 2022. La barca è del 2016, nella primavera del 2021 è stato fatto un restyling completo con trasformazione della classe da 2 a 1 senza limiti, di seguito gli interventi fatti e la lista optional:   1. classe di immatricolazione 1 no limit dalla costa, installazione di nuova strumentazione per cambio classe (AIS, SART, EPIRB, NAVTEX + VHF) oltre alla zattera e i razzi, (investiti oltre 40.000€ solo per dotazioni cambio classe)    2. Generatore Panda 6kw + Aria condizionata 3 zone + Inverter   3. Water maker 70L/h   4. Lavastoviglie doppio cestello, ice maker, cantina vini, tv 55 pollici con playstation, macchina caffè Nespresso.   5. Ventilatori in tutte le cabine e dinette, nuove luci con charge usb incorporato   6. 4 Under Water Light   7. Passerella elettrica Besenzoni 250cm   8. Cuscineria esterna nuova grigio scuro + sun bed + nuovi timoni in carbonio   9. Full teck nuovo a prua, coperta e corridoi laterali   10. Nuova Ancora + 100 metri catena + telecomando ancora wifi   11. 3 wc elettrici   12. Randa e fiocco nuove ancora da installare   13. Doppio plotter B&G esterno + Autopilot + Radar + Ais 1 + Ais 2   14. Elica di prua retrattile   15. Dinghy garage con verricello elettrico per la salita del dinghy + compressore aria (vi è un Wiliams 285 turbojet 110hp del 2020 che verrebbe eventualmente venduto a parte)   16. Piattaforma elettrica a poppa con binario per la salita del Wiliams Turbojet   17. 2 winch elettrici Lewmar + 2 winch manuali Lewmar   18. 2 Tavoli con gamba elettrica in pozzetto trasformabili in sunbedTutti gli optional sopra elencati sono stati acquistati ed installati nuovi nel 2021.   Il layout della barca è 2 cabina a prua + 2 toilet con wc elettrico, 2 cabine a poppa + 1 toilet con wc elettrico, cabina di quinto a sinistra con letti a castello.   Crew cabin a prua con wc.  Randa rollata più fiocco.  L'utilizzo è stato armatoriale per 3/4 settimane all'anno + 3/4 settimane di charter sempre con crew (skipper + Hostess).  La barca viene venduta da ditta croata con iva esposta non versata in quanto registrata come barca da charter.   La barca sarà disponibile da Ottobre 2022.Mehr anzeigen

name: 1850 Crew tender 17001850 Crew tender 1700
description:
Een Crew tendert in de online veiling. Iedereen kan eenvoudig meebieden tot 31 Oktober 2022 op de website van Bootveiling.


Een crew tender welke voor het ruige werk bestemd is geweest.  Na zijn actieve dienst zijn de motoren uitgenomen voor een zusterschip.  Hierdoor heeft de nieuwe eigenaar de kans om of direct te hermotoriseren of de ruimte te gebruiken als woonschip / opslag locatie.  Hermotorisatie is natuurlijk ook mogelijk en dan kunnen er 2 motoren is van 979 PK welke een bollard pull van 5.000 kg aankan.    De topsnelheid van dit schip met motoren was 36 knopen.
EXTRA INFORMATIE

De tender heeft geen motoren
Werking apparatuur aanbood is onbekend
Bootveiling is een onafhankelijk gespecialiseerd boten veilinghuis. Onze boten worden verkocht onder de veilingvoorwaarden

name: 2003 Lagoon Lagoon 5702003 Lagoon Lagoon 570
description:
Lagoon 570 Catamaran 2003
New Zealand tax paid / Steuern für NZ sind bezahlt
2x 110hp Yanmar 2016 (890h)NZ$ 867,000 (EUR550,000)Whangarei New Zealand fully equipped
A fast and large, never chartered catamaran with many luxury amenities such as a dishwasher, washing machine, electric grill, microwave gas oven and large screen TV.Much new in 2021 and 2022.The engines, generator 12kW, rigging and many other things were redone in 2016 and 2017 for more than NZ$290.000 (EUR185,000).Originally built in 2003 to the highest specification for an Italian owner who only used the boat for three weeks. She was then laid up until the end of 2005 when she was purchased by the privies UK owner who has maintained and restored the catamaran as a thoroughbred ocean cruiser.  The hulls are vacuum-bagged laminate, with vinylester resin used throughoutBuilt by CNB, leaders in composite material manufacturing Classic ocean cruising catamaran, which has been very extensively restored, for a fraction of today's build cost. Don't miss this opportunity to acquire an extremely capable and reliableAfter owning the 570 for a decade of glorious ocean sailing, the privies owner started considering other options within the market and tried out various other vessels in order to find an alternative ocean going catamaran suitable for his circumnavigation needs. However, after realising that he was unable to find anything else as well built as this particular Lagoon 570, he decided that it would be much better to refit the existing boat.  As a result, in 2016, she has been restored with all new equipment, while retaining the integral overall build quality, hand built interior and workmanship of the original CNB build. The cost of the refit carried out in Canet en Roussillon, France.This four-cabin version with galley down in the port hull has had virtually all essential items replaced - engines, sails, standing rigging, generator, batteries, charger, solar panels, water-maker and more. Her cockpit features twin helm stations positioned aft and outboard, but still protected from the elements.  InventuryNever charteredTeak floorsLong, sleek hulls for added performance as opposedto the very wide hulls on the newer modelsHulls made of multi-directional fibreglass mat, withcarbon fibreReinforcement in high-load and stress areas

This one-off classic lady shows in every inch she is a true eye-catcher. Once she draws your attention, you simply cannot stop looking at her. The low maintenace mahogany hull and structure is strong and solidly built. Inside the light and spacious deck house, with a basic, stylish and neat interior, you feel directly comfortable. The present owners, as you can see and feel when on board, keep this Classic Yawl in excellent condition. The last 10 years many upgrades have been done. If you are really looking for something different, this is an opportunity you cannot miss!

name: 1982 S&S 55 Based Modern Classic1982 S&S 55 Based Modern Classic
location: Zierikzee, the Netherlands. Visit on appointment. , Niederlande
description:
Prachtige modern classic, gebaseerd op een ontwerp van Sparkman and Stephens. 


De 'De Blauwe Maan' is met recht een 'head turner'. In elke haven word je met een glimlach ontvangen en overladen met positieve reacties.  Niet op de laatste plaats is het jacht een genot om mee te zeilen, zowel met licht als met zwaar weer. Het jacht voorziet in een ruime en lichte deksaloon, sfeervol afgetimmerd met authentieke details. 


Algemeen
Overig: 
De Blauwe Maan is in 1982 ontworpen en gebouwd door Manfred Kessler, waarbij het onderwaterschip gebaseerd is op beroemde Sparkman & Stephens Bloodhound van de jaren 30. De romp is 'cold moulded'5 lagen van 7 mm mahonie diagonaal epoxy verlijmd. De loden kiel is voorzien van rvs kielbouten. De romp is in 2016 geschilderd. 

Accommodatie
Overig: 
De eigenaarshut in het voorschip is voorzien van een fonteintje, verborgen toilet en verschillende hang- en legkasten. 

Motor, electra, water
Voortstuwing: Schroefas voorzien van generator. Batterijen worden onder zeil geladen. 
Warm water: 220v (boiler 40 ltr) en motor

Tuigage
Bezaan: Met lazyjacks + aap (zeil tussen de bezaan en hoofdmast)
Genua: Rolgenua
Fok: Rolfok

Uitrusting
Dekzeil(en): 1x zonnetent kuip, 1x zonnetent voordek
Zwemplatform: Teak zwemplatform, inklapbaar tegen de romp.

description:
Il grand soleil 56 è cavallo di razza di Del Pardo nato per soddisfare le richieste di una crociera di lusso e per soddisfare le performance con qualsiasi vento. è la barca ideale per chi cerca le linee intramontabili, potenti, eleganti.
Non ci sono importanti manutenzioni da sostenere: negli ultimi anni l’armatore ha sostituito il sartiame , le vele e ha installato un nuovo dissalatore e aria condizionata.

name: 2013 Beneteau Oceanis 552013 Beneteau Oceanis 55
description:
Die OCEANIS 55 ist bekannt für ihr raffiniertes Design, ihre hervorragende Performance und Ausstattung. Dieses Boot aus dem Jahr 2013 wurde stets in einwandfreiem Zustand gehalten und ist extrem gut ausgestattet. Wahrscheinlich eines der am besten gewarteten Gebrauchtboote dieser Kategorie auf dem Markt ! Es verfügt über drei Doppelkabinen mit je einer Nasszelle. Herausragend aus der langen Liste der zusätzlichen Ausstattung sind sicher eine hydraulische Gangway von BESENZONI, ein hochwertiges 3,4 m Rib mit 15 PS YAMAHA- Motor und hochwertige 7-Zonen – Kaltschaummatratzen in der Eignerkabine. 
Ein Schiff, nach dem man suchen muss...
 Gern senden wir Ihnen ein ausführliches Exposé zu!Mehr anzeigen

description: A unique yacht, designed by Laurent Giles, built-in 0.9mm aluminium by the revered Royal Huisman Shipyard in the Netherlands, finished in the UK by AH Moody & Son. It was extensively refurbished and modernised.It is equipped with a 6 kW generator, 150 lt / h water maker and air conditioning. 3 double cabins and a large master cabin with the ability to accommodate four people. Large protected and habitable central cockpit, teak deck and dinghy with 15 hp outboard.Mehr anzeigen

description:

name: 2016 Dix Harvey DH 5502016 Dix Harvey DH 550
description:
Model: DIX HARVEY DH 550 Type: catamaran sailing yacht LOA (m): 16,75 Beam (m): 8,70 Draft (m): 1,10 Air draft (m): 25,00 Headroom (m): 2,00 Year built: 2016 Launched: 2016 Builder: JJ Provoyeur & R. Bertie Country: South Africa Designer: Dudley Dix & Phil Harvey Displacement (t): 14 CE norm: A Hull material: wood epoxy Hull colour: off-white Hull shape: round-bilged Keel type: long keel Superstructure material: wood epoxy Deck material: wood epoxy Fuel tank (litre): 2x350L stainless steel Level indicator (fuel tank): yes Fuel daytank (litre): 2x68L Level indicator (daytank): yes Freshwater tank (litre): 2x490L stainless steel Level indicator (freshwater): yes Blackwater tank (litre): 2x32L polyethylene Wheel steering: cable steering Inside helm position: yes Outside helm position: yes Emergency tiller: yes More info on hull: new coppercoat 2021 The Beautiful Dix/Harvey design with the elegant long curves of the superstructure really stands out! Built on a mahogany structure with plywood on red cedar stringers and glassfiber/epoxy reinforced hulls, this large cat is very stiff and light with a displacement of only 14 tonnes. The interior of the decksaloon is very light and spacious thanks to the oversized windows of shatterproof glass. Sleeping 6 in 3 large cabins with an owners cabin and bathroom in the portside hull. The clever layout of sails, sheets and winches makes it possible to sail her across the oceans with a small crew. 
For more information: DIX HARVEY DH 550 for sale at De Valk Yachtbrokers - Click here:Mehr anzeigen

name: 2008 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 54 DS2008 Jeanneau Sun Odyssey 54 DS
description:
A maintainned 2008 example of the popular Sun Odyssey 54 DS, tax paid and spanish registered.Twin-level cockpit featuring double wheels aft, each binnacle contains molded consoles for sailing instruments, her current mooring and 2 garages/storages are available for separate discussion, the concession is valid until 2035.
The Sun Odyssey 54DS has 3 double ensuite cabins and 1 bunk bed cabin and is extremely spacious for 6 guests. The master cabin has a huge walk-in area and king sized berth. There are two other spacious double cabin berths for guest use, both with ensuite shower faacilities. This beautiful, spacious air-conditioned boat offers all the extras and amenities that one would expect of a quality luxury yacht. Real teak wood and leather has been used throughout.
 
DESCRIPCIONUn ejemplo mantenido en 2008 del popular Sun Odyssey 54 DS, con impuestos pagados y registrado en español.Cabina de dos niveles con ruedas dobles en la popa, cada bitácora contiene consolas moldeadas para instrumentos de navegación, Su amarre actual junto con 2 trasteros / Almacenaje de los cuales la concesión es válida hasta 2035, esta disponible aparte.
El yate de vela Sun Odyssey 54DS tiene 3 cabinas dobles con baños junto con una litera y es extremadamente espacioso para 6 personas. La cabina principal tiene una gran área para estar y una litera tamaño king. Hay otras dos literas de cabina doble espaciosas para uso de los invitados, ambas con instalaciones de ducha en suite. Este hermoso y espacioso barco con aire acondicionado ofrece todos los extras y comodidades que uno esperaría de un yate de lujo de calidad. Se ha utilizado cuero y madera de teca auténtica en todas partes.Mehr anzeigen

name: 2014 Hanse 5752014 Hanse 575
description: Eine sehr gut gepflegte Hanse 575, Erster Eigner. Moderne Yacht und luxuriöse Eleganz kombiniert mit kompromissloser Funktionalität. Interieur in American Cherry mit Bodenbelag in klassischen Streifen. Easy Tender System mit Badeplattform. Tiefgang nur 2,25 Meter mit L-Kiel. Salon mit Sitzbank (U-Form), Salontisch, ausziehbar Arbeitsplatte in der Pantry, schwarz Bodenbeleuchtung im Salon und indirekte Beleuchtung im Salon und in den Kabinen Navigation elektronische Instrumentation: AIS (Transponder Klasse B), Ruderlageanzeiger, 2 Kompass, Kettenzählwerk, Logge (1 B und G Triton Multidisplay im Cockpit inkl. Geber und Temperatur), 2 Display (B und G Triton Multidisplays oben, eines an jedem Steuerstand), Echolot (B und G Triton Multidisplay), Log (1 B und G Triton Multidisplay im Cockpit inkl. Geber), Autopilot ((B und G mit Gyrokompass Fluxgate RC 42 NMEA)), 2 Kartenplotter mit GPS (B und G Zeus 12''), Radar (B und G 3G Broadband), Windmessanlage (Windstation B und G UKW V50 am Navigationstisch u. 2 H50 Steuerständen). Deck und technische Ausrüstung: Anker (Delta 40 kg, 60m Kette), Druckwasserpumpe, 5 Batterien (4 x 165Ah, 1 x 90 Ah), Teak auf Laufdecks, Batterieladegerät (AGM), Cockpitdusche (warm/kalt), Doppelsteueranlage (Carbon-Style), Heckstrahlruder (24V einfahrbar), Bugstrahlruder (24V), Gangway, 2 automatische Bilgepumpe, Teak im Cockpit (mit Fußstützen), Landanschluß, elektrische Ankerwinde (Lofrans, mit Remote Control), Badeleiter, 2 Cockpittisch (aus Teakholz), 2 Relingsdurchstiege (beidseitig), 4 Winschen elektrish (Lewmar 2 x 65 EST EVO, 2 x 55ST EVO). Anlagen an Bord: Warmwasserbereiter, Klimaanlage reverse cycle (32.000 BTU, 4 Einheiten), Inverter (12V -220V / 2500W), 12V Steckdose (div), 220V Steckdose (div), Heizung (Warmwasser-Ringheizung). Unterhaltung: 6 Lautsprecher (2 x im Cockpit, 4 x Innen High-End-2-Wege), Stereoanlage (FUSION MS-AV700i Radio, CD / DVD-Player). Zubehör Sails: Gennaker-Ausrüstung, kugelgelagerte Mastrutscher (MDS Slider Case System für Groß und Fock), Lazy Bag, Lazy Jack, Achterstagsspanner (10mm), Starrer Baumniederholer. Küchen-und Haushaltsgeräte: Tiefkühlschrank (70l, 230V, Frontöffnung), Herd, Kühlschrank (70l, Frontöffnung), Waschtrockner (Kombi), Waschmaschine (Kombi). Polsterung: Sprayhood (mit Edelstahlrahmen und Fenster), Instrumenten Abdeckung. Hinweis-Zubehör: großes AC-Panel, extra Wind-Station, Komfortmatrazen für alle Kojen Easy-Tender-System (einschließlich stärkerer Hydraulik für die Badeplattform) Generator, FISCHER PANDA 10000i, 8kW mit Wartungspaket (inkl. großem AC-Panel) Scheuerleiste aus Teakholz mit Scheuerleiste aus Edelstahl 4 zusätzliche Klampen, 2 vorne und 2 hinten Spreader lighting, 4 up, 4 down 2 Steuermannssitze mit Teakholzbelag 7 Matrix-Ventilatoren, Abwasseranlage FUSlON MS -NRX200 Remote control FUSION MS in Cockpit UNIDOCK Docking station for iPod/iPhone USB, Android FUSlON MS-BT200 Bluetooth, Audio / data interface 8 Fender / 4 Festmacher, 2 elektrische Winschkurbeln, 4 Extra KlampenMehr anzeigen

name: 2013 Hanse 5752013 Hanse 575
description:
A SEA VILLA with every comfort. Ample outdoor space thanks to the bimini, generous cockpit and garage for storing the tender. Synthetic teak: no maintenance! Very easy manoeuvring with stern thruster and bow thruster. Inside the boat you will feel at home: air conditioning, a large kitchen, washing machine, dishwasher and much more. The layout is really functional: 3 double cabins, 2 bathrooms with separate shower and a cabin with bunk beds. The owner has already done antifouling and engine overhaul, so all you have to do is start up and go. Used Hanse 575. Boat offered with exclusive sales contract. Authorised shipping brokerage company. This boat really exists: we were personally on board, checked the documents and carried out the photo shoot. The engine hours indicated refer to the date of this sheet. Book your private live video visit 45 minutes only for you. See the complete card directly on our website ABAYACHTING. The data in this sheet are not contractual.
__
UNA VILLA SUL MARE con tutti i comfort. Ampi spazi esterni grazie al bimini, al generoso pozzetto e il garage per ricoverare il tender. Teak sintetico: nessuna manutenzione! Manovre molto semplici con elica di poppa ed elica di prua. All'interno della barca ti sembrerà di essere a casa: aria condizionata, una grande cucina, lavatrice, lavastoviglie e molto altro. Il layout è davverò funzionale: 3 cabine matrimoniali, 2 bagni con doccia separata ed una cabina con letti a castello. Il proprietario ha già fatto antivegetativa e tagliando motore e perciò non ti resta che mettere in moto e partire. Hanse 575 usato. Possibilità di permuta. Possibilità di subentrare nel leasing attualmente in corso. Imbarcazione proposta con contratto di vendita in esclusiva. Società di mediazione marittima autorizzata. Questa barca esiste davvero: siamo stati personalmente a bordo, abbiamo controllato i documenti ed effettuato il servizio fotografico. Une VILLA DE MER avec tout le confort. Ample espace extérieur grâce au bimini, cockpit généreux et garage pour ranger l'annexe. Teck synthétique : aucun entretien ! Manœuvres très faciles avec le propulseur de poupe et le propulseur d'étrave. Le propriétaire a déjà fait l'antifouling et la révision du moteur, donc tout ce que vous avez à faire est de démarrer et de partir. Hanse 575 d'occasion. Bateau offert avec contrat de vente exclusif. Société de courtage maritime agréée. name: 2018 Fountaine Pajot MY 442018 Fountaine Pajot MY 44
description: Le seul MY44 immédiatement disponible pour la voile, comme un bateau d’occasion, MAIS dans un état presque neuf! Il est une version Maestro & Platinum, lancée en août 2018, et a été obtenu par son propriétaire comme un yacht de luxe privé!Il est disponible avec une suite Propriétaires et sa salle de bain aveante, deux cabines doubles chacune avec salle de bain chacune.Le MY44 capture l’essence de Fountaine Pajot Motor Yachts promesse : pour élargir vos horizons.L’espace de vie à bord, évocateur d’une maison de vacances, est tout simplement époustouflant : son immense flybridge offre une superbe vue à l’horizon, son salon, un loft actuel avec sa propre terrasse, dispose d’un salon spacieux et d’une cuisine qui s’ouvre directement sur le cockpit.Le Motor Yacht MY44 est configuré pour satisfaire vos exigences les plus folles pour le plus haut niveau de confort. L’esthétique conçue par Pier Angelo Andreani est captivante avec ses lignes modernes, mêlant de beaux matériaux, et fait certainement le MY 44 une référence essentielle dans le monde du Motor Yacht.Mehr anzeigen

Wyposażenie pod pokładem: kuchenka gazowa z piekarnikiem ( w komplecie dwie butle po 6 kg ) dwukomorowy zlew zasilany wodą z ręcznej pompki i pompy elektrycznej, Lodówka komorowa otwierana od góry, łazienka przednia umywalka plus elektryczna ubikacja połączona ze zbiornikiem na nieczystości, łazienka rufowa wyposażona w umywalkę i ubikację z ręcznym od pompowaniem zaburtowym.
